Title: Psychocat: The Answer
description: "Short" Arcade Game about the life of a cat named "Zag", who desperately seeks an answer. The evil and unique gameplay is about reversing the controls on the keyboard.

Title: City Car Parking Simulator
description: Enjoy city driving in the City Car Parking Simulator, full of realistic driving experiences and challenging parking missions. Customize your vehicle and test your skills in this simulation game that offers a unique atmosphere with its graphics.

Title: Square Dungeon 2
description: "Square Dungeon 2" is a dungeon exploration + roguelite text-based indie game. The demon king left a prophecy to the human king before death that the warriors would betray him when the Armageddon came. As a warrior, what will you choose on the Armageddon?

Title: Need For Conquest
description: Need for Conquest is a turn-based strategy game with a very simple objective - to capture all enemy territories on a map and achieve global domination. If you like RISK® style games but you want to enjoy the freedom of procedurally generated maps and level editor, this game is for you.

Title: Neon City Climbing Simulator
description: Climb tall buildings with Neon City Climbing Simulator! Prepare for an adrenaline-filled adventure with excitement, realistic graphics, and challenging missions.

Title: 3D Hentai Checkers
description: A classic board game - checkers, in which you have to play with 5 girls. To win, you must capture all the checkers of the opponent. And as a reward you will receive nude images.

Title: Police Car SUV Simulator
description: Police Car SUV Simulator is a police car simulation with realistic graphics. Catch criminals, take them to the police station, and customize your vehicle with the rewards you earn.

Title: SPACE BATTLE: Humanity
description: The day has come… Humanity has been attacked by an alien race.You have space bases at your disposal. Use them to launch battleships and take over the alien mothership.

Title: The Plague Doctor of Wippra
description: The plague spreads agony and fear in the small town of Wippra. As a plague doctor, you bring healing and relief wherever you can. But ignorance, superstition, and religious zeal make for a deadly threat in this retro medieval medical adventure!

Title: Neo Cab
description: A visual novel about emotional survival in an automated world. Play as Lina, the last human cab driver. It’s your first night driving the lonely streets of Los Ojos, and your best friend has just disappeared. Stay on the road. Stay on the search. Stay human.

Title: Dark Days : Devil Hunt
description: Fight with many demon goblin golems that invaded all over the Middle Ages Use your special powers.

Title: Colorpick - PRO
description: Choose a color of your liking and copy the value (multiple color-codings supported) to the clipboard for use in any other application. Best for creativity purposes.
genre: Casual, Animation & Modeling, Design & Illustration, Photo Editing, Utilities, Video Production, Game Development

Title: Infinity Tempest
description: You must help the three heroes to flee from their pursuers in an endless race for the survival of humanity.

Title: Game Machines: Arcade Casino
description: Game Machines: Arcade Casino is a simulator of playing on the game machines. Great entertainment for long hours. Check your reflex, skills, and luck. Become the master and claim the cash! Retro.
genre: Casual, Indie, Simulation, Sports, Early Access

Title: The Matriarch
description: Play Hide & Seek in a diabolical convent where everyone is an imposter.

Title: 3D PUZZLE - Medieval Inn
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, RPG, Simulation, Sports, Strategy

Title: 3D PUZZLE - Farming
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, RPG, Simulation, Sports, Strategy

Title: Burger Restaurant Simulator
description: Join Burger Restaurant Simulator for delicious moments! Enjoy making hamburgers with great graphics and rich content.

Title: Real Motocross Driving Simulator
description: Get the real Motocross driving experience! Complete exciting missions, earn rewards and unlock new motorcycles.

Title: Psychocat: The Door
description: A Challenging & Psychedelic mind-bending runner with a control swapping mechanic that will mess with your head. Will you manage to catch the door ?

Title: Real Drift Multiplayer
description: Real Drift Multiplayer is a drifting game with realistic graphics and extensive customization options. Aim for the highest scores by competing with your opponents in single and online modes.

Title: Police Car Escape Simulator
description: Are you ready for the multi-directional chase of the cops? Experience an adrenaline-filled police game with Police Car Escape Simulator. Escape, crash and beat the cops in fast vehicles!

Title: The Office Quest
description: Every day in the office is the same, clicking the same keys, attending the same boring meetings, wearing the same fluffy monster onesies, until something strange and magical happens. Now you need to sneak away, no matter how!

Title: Lumencraft
description: Lumencraft is a unique combination of a top-down, rogue-like shooter and base building with tower defense elements. Dig and light up dark halls of a fully destructible environment on procedurally generated maps and campaign levels to find precious Lumen - humanity's only chance for survival.

Title: School Bus Driving Simulator
description: Experience a realistic school bus with the exciting School Bus Driving Simulator! Get students safely to school, earn rewards, and customize your bus.

Title: Garbage Truck Driving Simulator
description: Collect all the garbage in the city with the garbage truck and enjoy the car game.

Title: Extreme Bus Driver Simulator
description: Are you ready to become an experienced bus driver? Experience the thrill of transporting passengers in a realistic city with Extreme Bus Driver Simulator! Get passengers to their destination on time and safely, earn rewards and customize your bus.

Title: LIBERATED
description: Lock, load, and get ready for a new kind of action adventure! Immerse yourself in a noir rain-soaked city inside a paperback comic. Uncover a cyberpunk conspiracy against human rights. THIS is the revolution.

Title: BLOWFLY
description: This is an NES style platformer game, fly and explore to find pink poo in the map and destroy them, which is the only condition to pass the level. You need to avoid dangerous traps, defeat the alien creature AssMan that invades the earth, and achieve the final victory!
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation

Title: Shadow of the Night
description: Hunt and fight this nature's challenges! Build, research and survive against bears.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Early Access

Title: Genesis Noir
description: A noir adventure spanning time and space. When a love triangle between cosmic beings becomes a bitter confrontation, you'll witness a gunshot fired by a jealous god—otherwise known as The Big Bang. Jump into the expanding universe and search for a way to destroy creation and save your love.

Title: Real Drift Multiplayer 2
description: Real Drift Multiplayer 2 offers a unique experience waiting for drift enthusiasts! Experience a real racing simulator with customizable vehicles, competitive online modes, and realistic drift dynamics.

Title: Heroine Anthem Zero -Sacrifice-
description: 《Heroine Anthem Zero : Sacrifice》 is an epic fantasy 2D side-scrolling ARPG with Japanese voiceovers and support for 7 languages. In a world unforgiven by God, it is a story of sacrifice and survival ten years in the making. Come and enter a world of adventure from long ago.

Title: My Pleasure - Season 1
description: My Pleasure is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel, full of hot women, mystery, and sex! This VN is packed with high-quality graphics, a rich story, humor, and hot close-up animations!

Title: Greak: Memories of Azur
description: Greak: Memories of Azur is a single-player puzzle platformer adventure. Azur is under threat from an enemy attack who have control of strange creatures infecting the land. Take on the role of three siblings: Greak, Adara and Raydel and utilize their unique abilities to escape the invasion together.

Title: Essential Power
description: Essential Power is a short visual novel. The main character's mundane routine is turned upside down when he meets Mia, a talented designer.

Title: Future Daoshi
description: The future world is full of monsters and beasts. As a surviving Daoshi, you shoulder the mission of reviving the sect and saving mankind. Can you be the last hope for mankind in the siege of various monsters?

Title: Shooting Game Builder
description: Shooting Game Builder is a tool for creating and distributing shoot 'em up with no programming required! You can create your own graphics, sounds, and ideas.

Title: Neon Abyss
description: Neon Abyss is a frantic, roguelite action-platformer where you run ‘n’ gun your way into the Abyss. Featuring unlimited item synergies and a unique dungeon evolution system, each run diversifies the experience and every choice alters the ruleset.

Title: VEGAS 19 Edit Steam Edition
description: VEGAS Edit 19 – Steam Edition comes with the editing tools you need to create engaging content like Let's plays, walkthroughs and gaming reviews. Achieve professional results while focusing on your story.

Title: Split Polarity: The Science Puzzle Arcade Game!
description: Get ready Scientists, things are about to get crazy! The atoms have become unstable, so it's your job to guide the highly volatile particles into the black holes. Play against friends in local multiplayer in Versus Mode, or attempt a high score in the Labyrinth.

Title: Maidens of the Ocean Solitaire
description: Maidens of the Ocean Solitaire is a watery tale you won’t soon forget! It’s the time of year when every mermaid in the ocean attends the fabulous aquatic party. Help the lovely merfolk prepare by escorting them to the event.

Title: Legendary Slide - Platinum Edition
description: In "Legendary Slide - Platinum Edition" you have to clear away mahjong tiles by sliding them next to matching ones. Solve mind bending puzzles and collect gems to restore the ancient temple of Air. This is the Platinum Edition with unique extra content!

Title: VEGAS Movie Studio 17 Platinum Steam Edition
description: Create breathtaking videos with the video editing software VEGAS Movie Studio 17 Platinum Steam Edition and create personalized audio for accompaniment with Music Maker Free.

Title: Bomber Fox
description: Bomber Fox is an action, sci-fi-themed game of the new generation, with an emphasis put into the dynamic gameplay, diverse level design, and innovative game modes.Play as Fox - the space cyborg, who has to win the grand robot-fighting tournament, to be granted a chance to go back home!

Title: MATH IS HORROR
description: 'Math is Horror' is a math based horror game where you must answer equations to unlock doors in an attempt to escape The Math Clown! Stuck in an asylum where the equations grow more difficult, How many rooms can you survive?

Title: The Unliving
description: Raise the dead as a fearsome Necromancer in the dark world of The Unliving! Lead your undead armies into the endless fight in this rogue-lite action RPG game. Burn cities to ash with devastating magic spells, slay epic bosses and turn your enemies into morbid servants.

Title: Heaven & Hell 2
description: Match 3 game with gorgeous visuals and over 200 challenging levels in 3 different game modes (swap, puzzle, group mode). Win powerful bonuses and special boosters to help you win a level. Enjoy the humorous story line and help the hero, little Mephistino to play pranks!

Title: Sheltered 2
description: A brutal survival management simulator set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland. Keep your faction of survivors alive, maintain your shelter and scavenge the ravaged world for resources. Befriend and trade with the factions you meet or conquer them by force.

Title: Tower of Chaos
description: Tower of Chaos is a unique combination of tactical auto battler and rogue-lite gameplay. Battle your way through the afterlife tower, manage your resources and relive the origins of your allies.

Title: Quadrium 2
description: Quadrium is back with a new and exciting mash-up of marble popper and match-3 challenge! Discover new bonuses and antibonuses and develop new strategies. Use mines to clear the field with explosive chain reactions and encounter fun boss battles that pit you against exciting challengers.

Title: Gaslamp Cases 5 - The dreadful City
description: Play the 5th part of the Match3 saga! Morgan, Jack, and Eleanor have solved numerous mystical casesin and out London, but their return to London greets them with terror. London is quarantined, caught in the grip of a mysterious illness, with no cure in sight - can they save thousands of lifes?

Title: Eldervale
description: Eldervale is a Third-Person Survival Horror Adventure game, made in the style of early 2000's classics. Explore a large, interconnected level, solve puzzles, uncover the story and survive the horrors by strategic use of your resources and fight or flight decisions.

Title: 100 Days without delays
description: In this Match3 game you have to help Lee Milton manage her task to setup a successful new airport - in mere 100 days! Collect three colorful items in a row, upgrade the airport, even help police to solve the crime, and she will become the youngest airport manager in a company’s history!

Title: Paranormal Stories
description: Assist Esther in this hidden object game, as she helps people with her clairvoyant ability, to solve paranormal crimes... Find hidden objects and play challenging mini games.

Title: 1912 Titanic Mystery
description: A thrilling Hidden Object Adventure on board of the most famous ship in the world! A bomb was hidden aboard the Titanic II, a replica of the famous cruise ship! You are the sole person who can find the bomb and save the passengers.

Title: HELLFRONT: HONEYMOON
description: HELLFRONT is a one-screen strategy game where quick thinking and sharp reflexes are everything. Play PVP or beat the campaign co-op or solo.

Title: VEGAS Edit 20 Steam Edition
description: VEGAS Edit 20 Steam Edition. Fast, easy editing to turn your stream highlights and gameplays into engaging and entertaining videos. Then share on your social media to grow your audience.

Title: Namariel Legends: Iron Lord Premium Edition
description: In this Steam Punk adventure quest the player will need to sneak into the citadel of cruel Iron Lord and rid invaded land of Namariel from tyrant after escaping from air prison, revealing the secret of Iron Lord and rescuing the legitimate King and Queen of Namariel.

Title: SOUND FORGE Audio Studio 14 Steam Edition
description: Quick and easy audio editing with cutting-edge technology: SOUND FORGE Audio Studio 14 Steam Edition delivers comprehensive digital audio editing tools and functions for recording, editing, restoration and mastering.

Title: Save the Planet
description: Naturally, your number one task is to kill the monsters! Just don’t let them cross the red line on the right. Track your progress as you go and Save the Planet in 60 match3 levels with escalating complexity!

Title: Worms Armageddon
description: Those intrepid invertebrates return with a vengeance in the much-loved Worms™ Armageddon. It’s a whole new can of worms! It’s hilarious fun that you can enjoy on your own or with all your friends.

Title: LONN
description: Immerse yourself in a thrilling adventure with LONN, a solo action-packed VR game. Play as a Bounty Hunter in a cyberpunk world and stop the evil WUX-n cult. Fight against adversity, and stay grounded in reality to survive against all odds.

Title: Swordship
description: Swordship is a roguelike where dodging is your best weapon. Trick your enemies into killing each other, steal containers to upgrade your ship and unlock new ways to play. Dodge, dive, die, learn, repeat.

Title: Alien Invasion 3d
description: In this game you have to be fast . Enemy planes are everywhere .

Title: SOUND FORGE Audio Studio 15 Steam Edition
description: Recording, editing, restoration and mastering in one – SOUND FORGE Audio Studio 15 is the audio tool that lets you achieve professional results easily and in no time at all.

Title: Around the World: Travel to Brazil
description: AviGames presents the first game in the series "Around the World: Travel to Brazil". Go on a trip to the sights of Brazil, search for various objects, play exciting mini-games and collect souvenirs.

Title: Ancestors: The Humankind Odyssey
description: Survive your evolution in Neogene Africa starting 10 million years ago. Ancestors: The Humankind Odyssey is a third-person open world survival game where you Explore, Expand, and Evolve to advance your clan to the next generation in the exciting new adventure from Panache Digital Games.

Title: Home Designer - Home Sweet Home
description: Help Hazel redesign client homes in this fun Hidden Objects game, "Home Designer: Home Sweet Home".

Title: Halloween Trouble 2
description: Halloween Trouble 2 is a family friendly Match-3 game with fun challenges and mini games for extra fun! Complete fun match3 puzzles and help Granny restore her cottage so she can celebrate Halloween!

Title: Overcooked! All You Can Eat
description: Experience all the Onion Kingdom has to offer, Overcooked! 1 & 2 infused with 4k goodness running at a smooth 60 FPS. Fully remastered and cooked up from scratch. Enjoy 200+ levels (22 new) and 80+ chefs (3 new), this is the ultimate Overcooked! experience.

Title: VROOM: Galleon
description: Experience virtual life at sea aboard a pirate ship!

Title: Firegirl: Hack 'n Splash Rescue DX
description: Take on the role of a young rescue officer starting her career. Armed with a trusty axe and high-pressure fire hose that also acts like a jetpack, Firegirl responds to emergency calls across the city. Can Firegirl save all the trapped civilians caught in each blaze?

Title: Amanda's Magic Book 4: True Love
description: In this magical Match-3 game, Amanda joins forces with Charlie in order to escape from a cursted castle and a fallen in love beast to save her father and the fairy tale world.

Title: DIG THE GROUND
description: Dig the Ground is a unique Match3 puzzler in which you have to match gems of the same color and use all sorts of tools to clear the ground tiles beneath you.

Title: Legacy - Witch Island
description: In this mystical hidden object adventure you strand on a mystical island ruled by an evil witch. Now the people of the island are depending on you to break the witch’s spell.

Title: Worms Rumble
description: Worms Rumble is Worms like you’ve never played it before, with intense, real-time, arena-based 32 player cross-platform combat. Get ready for Deathmatch and Last Worm Standing modes where you’re only ever a Holy Hand Grenade away from death!

Title: NARUTO TO BORUTO: SHINOBI STRIKER
description: Battle as a team of 4 to compete against other teams online! Graphically, SHINOBI STRIKER is also built from the ground up in a completely new graphic style. Lead your team and fight online to see who the best ninjas are!

Title: The Universim
description: Jump straight into managing your own planets as you guide a civilization through the ages. Build the ultimate empire in The Universim, a new breed of God Game in development by Crytivo.

Title: VEGAS Pro 18 Edit Steam Edition
description: VEGAS Pro 18 Edit – Steam Edition is a powerhouse of tools for creating Let's Plays and includes a screen capturing tool, truly mind-blowing special effects, intuitive operation and ultra-efficient workflows.

Title: White Shadows
description: The wolves are watching! Venture through a captivating but brutal dystopia where our young adventurer Ravengirl will travel through this huge city’s brightest highs and delve to its darkest depths on her perilous journey of discovery and finding her destiny where hope seems in short supply.

Title: SnowRunner
description: Get ready for the next-generation off-road experience! Drive powerful vehicles and overcome extreme open environments to complete dozens of challenging missions solo or with up to 3 friends!

Title: Alexander the Great: Secrets of Power
description: Unlock the secret of power of Alexander the Great, collect all the artifacts and save the world in this amazing hidden object adventure full of mysteries! Discover 30 unique locations, enjoy over 45 mini-games and dive into the fascinating storyline!

Title: Bravery and Greed
description: Bravery and Greed is a beat 'em up, roguelite, dungeon brawler for up to four players. Choose from four classic fantasy classes, engage in a deep robust combat system, and play a variety of co-operative and competitive game modes with friends via local, online or both. Get rich, or die trying!

Title: Big Adventure: Trip to Europe 2 - Collector's Edition
description: Prepare for a journey through 30 amazing tourist spots around Europe! Hunt for hidden objects and solve brain-teasing mini-games as you visit the Paleontological Museum in Paris, see the Pena Palace in Portugal, enjoy a walk in Bruges, and even ride the tram in Lisbon!

Title: Batora: Lost Haven
description: Batora: Lost Haven® is a choice-driven isometric action adventure with RPG elements and a unique duality system affecting combat, story, dialogues, puzzles, and endings, that will make you question the meaning of sacrifice.

Title: DREDGE
description: DREDGE is a single-player fishing adventure with a sinister undercurrent. Sell your catch, upgrade your boat, and dredge the depths for long-buried secrets. Explore a mysterious archipelago and discover why some things are best left forgotten.

Title: Fishjong 2
description: Fishjong is back with more colorful mahjong levels! Now play Fishjong 2! The goal is simple – clear the board by making matches. Various colors and shapes of tiles, new set and background. No storyline - just a great mahjong gameplay. Have fun playing ocean-theme levels.

Title: Insurgency: Sandstorm
description: Insurgency: Sandstorm is a team-based, tactical FPS based on lethal close quarters combat and objective-oriented multiplayer gameplay. Experience the intensity of modern combat where skill is rewarded, and teamwork wins the fight.

Title: Hidden Fears (Moonlight Edition)
description: A thrilling hidden object adventure... Can a just married couple survive a hellish ordeal and prove their undying love for each other?

Title: Scarytales: All Hail King Mongo
description: In this thrilling hidden object adventure the evil sorcerer Zarrar has returned to take vengeance upon your family and the kingdom from which he was banished years ago. After possessing your brother's mind through his dark magic, Zarrar seems to be unstoppable! Or can you find out, how to stop him?

Title: Allura: Curse of the Mermaid
description: Help the mermaid Allura to find all clues to solve her mysterious origin in this amazing underwater Match3 adventure!

Title: Darkheart: Flight of the Harpies
description: Challenge the evil presence in this magic Hidden Object Adventure game.

Title: Runes of Avalon 2
description: Runes of Avalon 2 ist a captivating match3 puzzle game that will take you to an enchanting world you won`t soon want to leave. Help sorceress Evelyne to defeat Morgana by matching 3 or more Runes of the same kind.

Title: Guards
description: Four heroes are facing a horde of evil! Ultimate abilities, magic artifacts, hero upgrades and clever tactics... All these will help to defeat the Boss.

Title: Planet of Lana
description: A young girl and her loyal friend embark on a rescue mission through a colorful world full of cold machines and unfamiliar creatures. Planet of Lana is a cinematic puzzle adventure framed by an epic sci-fi saga that stretches across centuries and galaxies.

Title: Moving Out 2
description: Moving Out is back and wackier than ever, and now with ONLINE PLAY! Return to Packmore and use your moving skills across brand new dimensions and some old favourites. Help rebuild Smooth Moves and become an all-star F.A.R.T. (Furniture Arrangement & Relocation Technician)!

Title: Mysteries of Neverville: The Runestone of Light
description: Play a thrilling hidden object adventure and solve the mystery of Neverville and find the stolen runestone of light.

Title: 7 Roses - A Darkness Rises
description: Help Amy heal the Tree of Life in the Hidden Object game "7 Roses – A Darkness Rises". The Darkness is coming and you and Amy have to save the world.

Title: Lucky Tlhalerwa's Cybernetic Titan
description: First-Person Action Round-Survival Shooter, The IMS Cybernetic Titan Duo: SGT Kozack And CPL Sebastian Have To Survive Guerilla Warfare Attacks By The Con-Federation Of Global Terrorism Sent By High Ranking CGT Officer MAJOR Nickolai Patrikov Who Wants To Kill Them For Sabotaging Protocol 87.

Title: Angkor: Runefall
description: Save an magical village in this extraordinary Match-3 game! Use the ancient runes to cast magic and defeat the dark powers.

Title: Hidden World of Art 2
description: In the hidden object game "Hidden World of Art 2" you have to restore real classical paintings by finding hidden items and solving puzzles!

Title: The Messenger
description: As a demon army besieges his village, a young ninja ventures through a cursed world, to deliver a scroll paramount to his clan’s survival. What begins as a classic action platformer soon unravels into an expansive time-traveling adventure full of thrills, surprises, and humor.

Title: CrazyDriving
description: Crazy Driving is a racing game with normal cars racing against time.

Title: Legacy - Witch Island 3
description: Your next hidden object adventure on Witch Island is about to begin! It’s up to you now, to take on these unique puzzle challenges to stop the evil witch and save two worlds from certain destruction!

Title: Night Loops
description: Journey through the psyche… Welcome to the Seaside Hotel, where the final hour of your night shift awaits. Tend to guests, explore their dreams, and lose your sense of Self – time and again. In this dark, labyrinthine adventure, unravel the path to the truth below.

Title: The Gunk
description: The Gunk is an action-adventure game in which you play as Rani, part of our duo of gritty space haulers. As they’re struggling to bring in funds, they chance upon an untouched planet brimming with life. They came in search of valuable resources, and it looks like they’ve hit the jackpot…

Title: Yargis - Space Melee
description: Yargis is a fast paced, top down spaceship shooter. Customize your ship to join a battle online or offline. Yargis is focused on team based, close combat action. The game has a variety of battle and co-op game modes and a powerful editor make Yargis a great game!
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy

Title: Legendary Mahjong
description: Enjoy a new way to play Mahjong, with varied styles of challenged as you progress. Have the option to customize your game with the layout and tiles of your choice. Get set for a brilliant Mahjong Game with an accompanying campaign to get you well entertained.

Title: CDF Ghostship
description: CDF Ghostship is a science-fiction Old-style shooter featuring an open-world spaceship, space station and colony. Each new game will offer a challenge with random story-lines and narrative, random enemies and multiple endings. Can you escape the Ghostship?

Title: Return to Monkey Island
description: Return to Monkey Island is an unexpected, thrilling return of series creator Ron Gilbert that continues the story of the legendary adventure games.

Title: Say No! More
description: SAY NO! MORE is the world’s first NPG (NO!-Playing Game). Play as an intern with a burning desire to say NO! to everything and everyone. Customize your character, say NO! in different styles and languages, clap back at mean colleagues and change the world!

Title: Schoolmates: The Mystery of the Magical Bracelet
description: Long ago, a dark order of mages decided to wreak havoc upon the land but was kept at bay by another group known as the Selena order. Help the three young apprentices, Flex, Eva and Blondie to defeat a powerful mage in this incredible hidden object and point & click adventure!

Title: EscapeRoute
description: The robots are in control , things are so tight you think you can’t even breath without letting them know. You decide to not be part of this and then it happens …..

Title: Source of Madness
description: Source of Madness is a side-scrolling dark action roguelite set in a twisted Lovecraftian inspired world powered by procedural generation and AI machine learning. Take on the role of a new Acolyte as they embark on a nightmarish odyssey.

Title: Wavetale
description: Surf the waters of a submerged city! Unravel the past, save the islanders from mysterious sea monsters and discover secrets hidden under the surface.

Title: Castle Wonders - A Castle Tale
description: Help Willy save a historical castle in this lovely Hidden Object game! Look for Hidden Objects, collect antique relics and play lots of mini games!

Title: Victorian Mysteries: The Yellow Room
description: In this hidden object adventure a young woman is attacked and murdered in the middle of the night inside a locked room. There are only two ways out: a dead- bolted door and a single window blocked by iron bars. How did the murderer escape?

Title: OverTheSpeedLimit
description: Test your racing skills with this challenging racing game . Customise your car , make it look better and faster and test it to a drag race . Be the first to cross the finish line in different racing classes .

Title: MAGIX Video deluxe 2021 Plus Steam Edition
description: Show them what you've got! The new MAGIX Video deluxe 2021 Plus Steam Edition enables you to edit videos professionally and cut your gameplay at end level quality.

Title: After Us
description: Explore the corners of a surrealistic post-human world to give life on Earth a second chance in this touching story about sacrifice and hope.

Title: Heaven & Hell
description: In the devilish match-3 game Heaven & Hell, you'll have to help the witty angel Angelo bring back the heavenly artifacts stolen by the devil. Solve hundreds great match-3 levels!

Title: Togges
description: Togges is a charming and colourful 3D Puzzle-Platformer. Go on adventures, stack adorable living blocks and solve puzzles around the Cosmos to save the Galaxy from the threats of the Void.

Title: Soccer Cup Solitaire
description: Chain together passing combos as you look to score the winning goal and succeed in this fun Solitaire game. Are you ready to square off against the likes of Brazil, England, Spain and the USA on your quest for the Cup?

Title: Jane Angel 2: Fallen Heaven
description: A hidden object adventure in which detective Jane Angel disappears under dramatical circumstances. Jane’s stepsister, Nancy starts investigating the case full of challenges like an ancient curse, a sophisticated conspiracy and secret relationships.

Title: Rorys Restaurant Deluxe
description: Rory just graduated from culinary school but she's too broke to pay for her school debt! Help her open a small restaurant and earn money to pay her debts! Play Rory's Restaurant: A unique Match3 and Cooking game! Enjoy familiar Match3 game mechanics in 70 challenging levels!

Title: The Escapists: The Walking Dead
description: Merging the smash hit indie game The Escapists with the world wide phenomenon that is The Walking Dead, Team17 have taken the very best of both worlds and are now providing players with the opportunity to play Rick Grimes as he takes on hordes of zombies let loose upon the world.

Title: 11 Islands 2: Story of Love
description: Play the sequel of the charming Match3 game "11 Islands"... Team up with the tribe’s shaman and a ship captain to fight a magical fog and save the island’s inhabitants.

Title: Viewfinder
description: Challenge perception, redefine reality, and reshape the world around you with an instant camera. Viewfinder is a new single player game offering gamers hours of interesting and fun experiences while uncovering the mysteries left behind.

Title: RUSSIAPHOBIA
description: Immerse yourself in the Russian Realities as Foreign Agents and help the Presidents Make Russia Great Again! Cooperative Multiplayer, World Government, Evil Russians and more! Russia is Waiting for You!
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Simulation, Strategy

Title: Epic Adventures: La Jangada
description: Help Minha in the hidden object adventure to save her father from the gallows in this 19th century. The epic story is based on Jules Verne’s novel La Jangada. Find evidence and solve intriuging puzzles as you travel through the great Amazon.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy

Title: 10th Corpse
description: 10th Corpse is a Match 3 game with plenty of fun twists. Enjoy 100 twisted Match3 levels and solve a murder in Mansion Vinterfragen!

Title: FleeTing
description: Move higher and higher, passing destructive areas on the way! Change the direction of your character with a single button on the screen, do not forget to collect power-ups that will help you in the game!

Title: Genesis Alpha One Deluxe Edition
description: Hyperjump into the dark recesses of space with Genesis Alpha One - a roguelike FPS where you must build, maintain and navigate your ship through a galaxy filled with hostile alien and human threats. Explore, create and survive the militarized space race in order to secure humanity’s future.

Title: Detective Agency Gray Tie 2 - Collector's Edition
description: AviGames presents the second game from the Detective Agency "Gray Tie" series. In this hidden objecft game you have to investigate the theft of a famous painting and solve loads of mindchallenging mini games and riddles!

Title: Snow Jewels
description: In this chilling match3 adventure, the Snow Dragon's icy breath is ready to destroy all it touches in the Mountain Lands. Only the magic of the Snow Jewels can stop the ruthless monster. Collect chains of gems and help bring back peace and tranquility to the Mountain Lands!

Title: Replik Survivors
description: This game is a time survival game with role-playing and roguelite elements. Through the choice of upgrades in battle to make the character stronger and stronger, defeat the oncoming enemies.

Title: Sugar Shack
description: Grab some friends, fire up the boiler, and let the syrup flow! Build the world around your cabin as you fulfill orders of hungry villagers with endless sweet tooths. There's never a dull moment in this cozy forest inspired by Quebec lore and art!

Title: Crystal of Atlantis
description: Years ago, a visitor from another world foresaw doom for a certain civilization on Earth. To save its people, he gave them a child to be raised among them, hoping his knowledge and insight would be enough to save them from their fate. Play a thrilling Match-3 game and help to save the earth!

Title: Krampus is Home
description: Sebastian is a teenager who is waiting for his parents to come back home on a cold Christmas night. Soon he realizes that there is something evil lurking around. Experience Sebastian 's journey into a Surreal world like no other. MULTIPLAYER (AVAILABLE NOW)

Title: BADLAND: Game of the Year Edition
description: With BADLAND: Game of the Year Edition, experience the multi-award-winning action adventure like never before - redesigned for Steam.

Title: Sweet Transit
description: Sweet Transit is a unique city builder where the railway is king and trains are the sole means of transportation. Quaint villages will expand to bustling cities, farms to industrious factories, and steam-powered rail to combustious diesel... and beyond in this interconnected, train-driven world.

Title: No More Rainbows
description: YOU ARE THE BEAST! Rampage through colorful worlds to reclaim your desecrated Underworld from parasitic beings of joy. Use intuitive locomotion mechanics to run, jump, claw, and climb using only your hands in an adventure that will remind you of your favorite platformers.

Title: Path of the Midnight Sun
description: Protect a noblewoman reckoning with unholy powers as she wards off the soul of the Demon King sealed inside her. Doubt your own companions, survive against unforgiving hordes of monsters. But beware; every choice has consequences in this epic JRPG adventure of betrayal, romance & self-acceptance.

Title: Runaway Animals
description: Runaway Animals is a 1-4 player co-op & PvP action-comedy game. A mysterious man with a monkey freeing wild animals in captivity. What could go wrong? Complete your duties at your underpaid job while you cope with these uncontrollable animals in this story-driven adventure.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Early Access

Title: Sea Legends: Phantasmal Light Collector's Edition
description: After a yacht crash in a mysterious storm, Jane finds herself on the coast of a mysterious island - and Mike is missing. Exploring the island, Jane must figure out what happened to Mike. Help them in this thrilling hidden object adventure!

Title: Hexus
description: Hexus is a unique game that combines Ancient Egypt mysteries: puzzles and strategy. 120 levels, 15 mini-games.

Title: King Of The Castle
description: Take your rightful place on the throne in this political party game for 4+ players. Rule the kingdom with an iron fist or silver tongue as you steer through bloodshed, intrigue & madcap disaster! Can you keep your crown when others plot your downfall? More importantly, can you keep your head?

Title: Robin's Island Adventure
description: The player finds himself on a desert island, where he meets the natives, carves a home, builds a ship and ultimately sails back home.

Title: Blasphemous 2
description: The Penitent One awakens as Blasphemous 2 joins him once again in an endless struggle against The Miracle. Dive into a perilous new world filled with mysteries and secrets to discover, and tear your way through monstrous foes that stand between you and your quest to end the cycle once and for all.

Title: Murder by Moonlight 2 - Crimson Night
description: Strange murders have shaken the city, the work of a twisted killer who only comes out at night and leaves his victims drained of blood. Help Detective Elliot in this thrilling Match3 Crime Story to solve the mysterious case.

Title: Bird
description: You are a bird, you are free in this small place, but you can't get out, all you can do is fly around.
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Early Access

Title: Kodon
description: Kodon is a 3D sculpting software for VR and Desktop. We make beginners experts with our intuitive, easy to learn interface, and invite experts to become gods through speed, immersion and feel.
genre: Simulation, Animation & Modeling, Design & Illustration, Education, Game Development

Title: Farmer's Father: Save the Innocence
description: War breeds heroes you've never heard of. You are the ordinary person holding a huge burden of protecting what's most precious and innocent. Fight with hunger, wounds, cold, disease, and enemy cruelty. Defend your family and survive the war!
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, Simulation, Early Access

Title: Amanda's Sticker Book
description: Enjoy a fun match-3 puzzle game for kids and adults alike! Put your matching skills to the test as you swap stickers and use power-ups to clear each puzzle.

Title: Worms Ultimate Mayhem
description: Load your weapons and experience a whole new dimension in destructive turn-based cartoon action!

Title: ONE PIECE World Seeker
description: Leave your compass behind and join Luffy as he embarks on a brand new action-packed adventure where you can experience the powers of the legendary Gum-Gum fruit to uncover hidden secrets on an original, never-before-seen island!

Title: Worms Pinball
description: The Worms™ crew returns, and this time they’ve got balls! The classic Worms™ Pinball sends the cute little pink guys spinning across one of the most realistic pinball tables ever created.

Title: Amanda's Sticker Book 2 - Amazing Wildlife
description: Can you help Amanda in this thrilling match-3 game and win the international sticker book competition? Play 79 thrilling match-3 levels with over 20 upgrades and bonusses!

Title: Crowns and Pawns: Kingdom of Deceit
description: Legends of the past come back to life in this charming point-and-click adventure. Pack your bags and journey with Crowns and Pawns: Kingdom of Deceit through modern day Europe to uncover the secrets of the king who was never crowned.

Title: Aqua Marbles - Ocean
description: Deep in the abyss of the ocean lies an underwater kingdom. Dive into a submarine atmosphere complete with colorful graphics and exciting music, but keep an eye out! In the deepest darkest corners lie sunken ships and castles full of danger. Check out match-3 from a fresh perspective!

Title: My Lovely Pets 2 Collector's Edition
description: "My lovely Pets 2" is an exciting game, which offers interesting ways to find funny and playful pets, as well as bright hidden objects, and a set of popular mini-games. Meet and make friends with these funny pets in beautiful game locations where they are always ready to hide and fool around.

Title: Helga the Viking Warrior 2: Ivar's Revenge
description: "Helga the Viking Warrior 2: Ivar's Revenge" is a challenging Viking match-3 game! Join the exciting adventures of Helga to defeat her new enemies!

Title: No Way Out
description: With the survival card battle genre, can upgrade and unlock new characters, you will freely experience and play again to collect rare items in the game. If you want to survive, the player must make reasonable calculations.

Title: This rain will never end - noir adventure detective
description: This rain will never end unless you discover who killed the mayor of the city!

Title: LEGO® Bricktales
description: In this puzzle-adventure, use an intuitive brick-by-brick building mechanic to solve puzzles and bring your creations to life! Experience a charming story as you explore beautiful LEGO® dioramas and help the people inhabiting them.

Title: Invasion 2: Doomed
description: In the hidden object adventure "Invasion 2: Doomed" the Earthly day has suddenly become several minutes shorter and an abnormal hurricane zone has formed in the tropics. Will you be able to save the earth from destruction?

Title: Pokitaire
description: Poker meets Solitaire in this innovative new mashup! Pokitaire is a fresh mix of Solitaire and Poker... Drag cards between Solitaire stacks to create poker hands, like a full house or royal flush. Each new hand increases your score multiplier to get you to the top of the leaderboards!

Title: Paper Cut Mansion
description: In this papercraft roguelite, explore a mysterious mansion floor by floor. Solve puzzles, battle enemies and complete quests as you unlock new abilities to aid you on each run as you solve the mystery behind the Paper Cut Mansion.

Title: RescueTeam
description: A single player TPS game where you must go on a rescue mission and return undercover agents to safety. Explore open world maps , collect coins , buy weapons and reach the highest score possible. Multi player mode , a TDM game with 2 teams fighting each other for the win .

Title: Rollerdrome
description: Rollerdrome is a BAFTA award-winning third person action shooter that seamlessly blends high octane, visceral combat with fluid movement and tricking mechanics into one complementary and challenging whole, to create an original adrenaline-pumping shooter experience like no other.

Title: SEMU
description: Space adventure can be scary, so that's why we at InkForge Studios have developed the most advanced Space Suit ever - the SEMU suit. Standing for Survival Extra-vehicular Mobility Unit, it will keep you safe as you journey the cosmos. With survival guaranteed, what else is there to worry about?

Title: Eleven Islands
description: Enjoy a thrilling match3 game! Disaster struck the Tribe of the Eleven Islands. A volcano eruption covered the tropical islands with lava and ash, which destroyed their houses and crops. It's up to you to restore houses, groves and crops for the tribe members.

Title: Marauders
description: Marauders is a tactical first-person multiplayer looter shooter set in a sci-fi universe. As a space pirate, work solo, or in a squad with up to 3 other players to navigate a hostile battleground, hunt for loot, craft new weapons and gear, and salvage what you’ll need to survive.

Title: Rescue bomber
description: Experience an upgraded version of Bomberman-like with more game modes and challenging levels! Play casually a VS mode with computer or your friends or try to complete intense story mode.

Title: VEGAS Movie Studio 17 Steam Edition
description: Video and audio editing made as easy as possible – with VEGAS Movie Studio 17 Steam Edition. Powerful, easy-to-use features give you everything you need for impressive and one-of-a-kind Let's Plays and gaming videos.

Title: King of Seas
description: King of Seas is an ARPG adventure game set in a nautical pirate world. Embark on an epic adventure across the seven seas where you’ll discover lost islands and treasures, fight rival pirates and menacing monsters, and become the most legendary pirate of all time!

Title: Serious Fun Football
description: SERIOUS realism with advanced ball physics and freedom of player movement, FUN casual dynamic gameplay, online or in single-player. This is Serious Fun Football. It's play ball time!
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Sports, Early Access

Title: Catherine Ragnor and the Legend of the Flying Dutchman
description: After falling victim to a curse, Captain Hendrick van der Decken of the Flying Dutchman is doomed to sail the seas for eternity. However, a chance encounter with another cursed pirate shows him a chance to find salvation. Play this thrilling Match3 adventure and help Captain van Decken.

Title: Colossus Mission - adventure in space, arcade game
description: Colossus Mission is an arcade game set in a space. Discover secrets of the odd spaceship, who unexpectedly entered Earth orbit.

Title: Goose Ronnie
description: Good afternoon dear friends! We present to your attention an exciting mini-game in which not only the adventures of a gosling, but also the love of a little girl are embodied! All of the illustrations for Goose Ronnie were created by our 9 year old daughter in memory of her friend.

Title: Curious Expedition 2
description: Curious Expedition 2 is a turn-based narrative roguelike set in a reimagined version of the late 19th century that uses procedural gameplay and story elements to create completely unique and epic adventures every time you play.

Title: Storm Chasers: Tornado Islands
description: One of the coolest Match3 games! Join Alex, her friend Professor Finch and her faithful dog Muffin in over 80 match-3 levels and rebuild a cloud village destroyed by a gigantic tornado!

Title: Suddenly Meow
description: Tim is an adventurous cat who loves to explore mysterious places and is always hungry for more. In this Match3 adventure he is lost in a dark forest full of shadows and dangers lurking under the silent trees. Help Tim escape and restore peace to the forest!

Title: Alien Invasion 3D part 2
description: This is the first stage of the Invasion . You are about to seek and destroy ground targets . There will be air forces trying to take you down , this time though , you have a team flying around trying to protect you.

Title: Greed 3: Old Enemies Returning
description: "Greed 3: Old Enemies Returning" is the last part of the thrilling "Greed" triology! Dr. Goodwin's miracle cure is once again under threat and Sara has contacted you for help. Old enemies are up to new tricks at Pontoon Laboratories and this time they are willing to kill to get their hands on the cure.

Title: HAINYA WORLD
description: You are an adventurer, you need to explore this continent, make good use of the resources of this continent to arm yourself, explore this world full of monsters and unknown things and survive!
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Early Access

Title: Railbreak
description: Power through hordes of zombies, '90s arcade style, in this on-rails survival horror shooter.

Title: Interplanetary: Enhanced Edition
description: In this turn-based strategic artillery game, players wage interplanetary wars by developing their home planets and firing massive barrages through the unpredictable gravity fields of the solar system.

Title: Lonely Mountains: Downhill
description: Just you and your bike - take it on a thrilling ride down an unspoiled mountain landscape. Make your way through thick forests, narrow trails and wild rivers. Race, jump, slide and try not to crash - all the way from the peak to the valley!

Title: Helga the Viking Warrior
description: Can you help jung Viking Helga in this epic Match3 game to avenge her Familie that was killed by a fierce stranger? With your help and the help of the mighty warrior Ragnar Lodbrok himself, you can succeeed...

Title: Killer Frequency
description: Killer Frequency is a first-person horror puzzle game set in 1987, that puts you in the role of a late-night radio talk show host in small town America whose callers are being stalked by a mysterious killer.

Title: Age of Darkness: Final Stand
description: Age of Darkness: Final Stand is a dark fantasy survival RTS where you must illuminate, build and defend humanity’s last bastion against hordes of Nightmares. Set in the remnants of a kingdom consumed by a deadly fog, you decide. Will you hide in the light? Or take back your world.

Title: ClearIt 13
description: "ClearIt 13" is a large and bright game that includes over 220 multiple levels of various complexity with Match3 gameplay.

Title: Maid PizzaHub
description: In the PizzaHub you will try any pizza for every taste. Spicy, sweet or maybe both? Come to our pizzeria!

Title: GOD WARS The Complete Legend
description: The latest in full-scale Tactical RPG receiving great reviews all around the world is finally on PC Steam! Enjoy the ensemble cast of heroes who fought in ancient Japan and capture the best in Tactical RPG consisting an overwhelming game volume of 142 battle stages and 160 hours in total play time.

Title: Estella's Nightmare: Sealed Space and a Succubus's Curse
description: In search of a cure for her father's illness, Estella, a cat-eared girl, entered the Cursed Forest by herself. When she accidentally activated a mysterious crystal, she was drawn into an alien dimension sealed by a magical anomaly. She then met a woman who called herself「Succubus」and gained mysterious powers from her...

Title: Need a packet?
description: Beep Beep Beep -> Register products -> Take cash -> Go insane. Need a packet is a horror-simulator about supermarket cashier, who is gradually losing her mind from routine work. She starts to feel that the cash register is turning into a medieval tower.

Title: Frozen Flame
description: A challenging exploration and survival adventure, set in the dying world of Dragons. Only those who harness the power of Frozen Flame have the means to survive the harsh conditions of the realm and able to muster the strength to cleanse it for good.

Title: Meta Sudoku
description: Meta Sudoku is a minimalist game, fresh interface and quiet music is very suitable for relaxation, reduce fatigue, give you the most comfortable experience.

Title: ETERNAL BLOOD
description: ETERNAL BLOOD is a high-adrenaline arcade-action FPS. Face legions of demons, harvest their souls and become a God of Destruction.

Title: Devils' Night Party
description: "When people forget 'him', we'll probably see a million devils partying in modern times..." So said a fragment of a lost ancient document...Could Natsuno Yamazakura protects the world’s peace?

Title: Choose Your Cutie
description: The girls are ready to meet you! Each of them is special. Choose your cutie!

Title: PARANOIA PLACE
description: PARANOIA PLACE is a 2 player online co-op survival horror game. Together or alone, you will need to solve puzzles, find items and run from the bloodthirsty demonic killer.
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, Simulation, Early Access

Title: ARCADE VS PLAYER
description: For a long time the arcade machines were won and forgotten in the corners of bars, but the time for the arcade machines revenge has arrived. prepare your coins.

Title: MILF Conditioning
description: You happened to save a MILF who happened to be the wife of your landlord, yet she had a weak character that didn't match her status – she couldn't refuse others. Having learnt that, would you take advantage and sleep with the beautiful landlady?

Title: Parasitic Evil
description: Amidst a catastrophe, the protagonists find themselves trapped inside a hospital that has been conducting mysterious research. While they manage to survive the initial disaster, they are soon confronted with insane mutations—and the struggle to escape the hospital which leaves both their sanity and physical forms under siege.

Title: Dark Secrets of Showbiz
description: In her attempt to solve the mystery of her parents’ death, Chen Ruoxia is accidently drawn into the storm of unspoken rules in the entertainment industry. Hiding behind it is a truth even uglier... In this showbiz world surrounded by dark secrets and conspiracies, will she be able to escape with the truth or will she become their next...

Title: Caterpillar
description: In the world of shadows, guide the caterpillar through forests and fields, dungeons and mountains, where enemies and obstacles await you. Eat flowers, defeat enemies, and clear your path to keep going.

Title: Touhou Endless Dream
description: A bullet hell roguelike game. Players can utilize characters with different abilities, collect and assemble powerful items. Dance through an unending barrage of bullets to save both yourself and Touhou Gensokyo from the darkness that is engulfing everything.

Title: Succubus Girl
description: Researcher Leo was told on his first day at the institute that he needed to look after some mysterious creature—an innocent girl who fed on semen... There seemed to be more to the girl's secret than that, but no one wanted to reveal the maddening truth.

Title: Dream Hacker
description: With the help of the dream machine, you can invade the dreams of sleeping girls. Here you can do whatever you want, or you can help them by interpreting their dreams and then collecting the “reward” you want.

Title: The Companion
description: A cinematic gaming experience. Play as an animal in the spiritual realm. Explore a magical world. Collect Essence and find Artifacts. Journey across seven majestic landscapes and witness the emotional story of a family as they tackle the challenges ahead of them.

Title: Lusitania: The Experience
description: Welcome aboard the RMS Lusitania, a luxurious ocean liner sunk by a German U-boat during World War 1. Immerse yourself in this detailed unique experience of how this great liner met its final moments on the 7th May 1915.

Title: Titanic: Fall Of A Legend
description: Step aboard the RMS Titanic and experience the last moments of the most famous ocean liner to have ever been built. This unique experience provides you with the tragic events in extraordinary detail that caused the Titanic's demise.

Title: Artur's Pinball
description: In this game the player will find several pinball tables joined in a single game, which turns the game into a big pinball table with locks, diamonds to be collected, passes, rotating crosses, springs and a few more things.

Title: Hardpunch: Fuck 4Joy
description: An incredible organic android is created by a mysterious engineer with the mission to discover and hunt technological artifacts created before our civilization existed. However, the true motivations of the engineer hide hidden secrets. Such a mystery is marked by resentment, obsession, and lust.

Title: ARENA 8
description: What happens when warriors, worlds and different times decide to face each other to know who is the best? The "ARENA 8", a place where these warriors can solve their differences.

Title: Freedom Finger
description: Freedom Finger is a music driven, side-scrolling shooter that sends you blasting and punching through 40 levels of bat$#!% crazy action. Starring Nolan North, John DiMaggio, and Sam Riegel! Soundtrack by Aesop Rock, Red Fang, Com Truise, Power Trip, Ty Segall, and many more!

Title: Age of Defense
description: Age of Defense is a tower defense game full of mind-blowing mayhem. There are tons of monsters and tough defenders in the game each of which fits perfectly into a funny cartoonish setting.

Title: Untamed Tactics
description: Untamed Tactics is a Tactical RPG set in world of colorful animals. Relive the legend of Greycoat’s escape into the untamed Wilds in a tale of lost honor and finding a new home as you fight, talk, and think your way through this beautifully illustrated adventure!

Title: Andarilho
description: You are a guy with a backpack, just try to stay alive!

Title: Root Letter Last Answer
description: A mystery adventure which is solved by using two visual features: Live Action and Illustrations.

Title: Bumper
description: BUMPER is a casual game made on Blender Game Engine where the player must to destroy the vehicles as much as possible, trying not to get caught by the police, reach the checkpoints to get time and improve your weapons.

Title: Foxy Tales
description: Get to know all the foxes, because each of them deserves attention. Dreamy, aggressive, funny, sweet - you will find a fox you like!

Title: Anime Zodiac
description: Hello! There are only three of us here: Capricorn, Leo, and Taurus. The rest of the zodiac signs were ashamed to appear on the page. However, even if they were not ashamed, they would not have enough space here ... But we did not just come for fun, so let's get acquainted!

Title: Battlerace
description: Battlerace is a first-person shooter with dynamic battlefields. Apply your own strategy using the available arsenal and lead your team to victory on a map with up to 16 players.

Title: Relayer Advanced
description: GODWARS TEAM presents the SRPG "Relayer Advanced"! The game depicts the fierce battle between the "Starchildren" and the extraterrestrial "Relayer" and lets you use the "Hate" and "Big Bang" systems to lead the battle to victory!

Title: A Sex Slave's  Love Story
description: A girl named Qian Xiangxiang, with a unique identity and status. Follow her struggles to live and fight for her love in a modern fantasy world where the country is controlled by five major corporations.

Title: SpeedOverflow
description: Who is not obsessed with the passion and pleasure brought by speed? This is an exhilarating roguelite hack-and-slash game with fast-paced action. You can choose different characters and level up to face hordes of enemies, embark on an unstoppable path, and conquer the unforgiving challenges!

Title: The Vagrant
description: Guide Vivian the Vagrant, through vibrant and dynamic landscapes while hacking and slashing a path from a quiet coastal village through mysterious forests, haunted castles, and wrecked battlegrounds. When the endless barrage of enemies have been vanquished, what solace will be left for our hero?

Title: Mr.Brocco & Co
description: Mr. Brocco & Co is a classic 2D platform game set in a fantasy world where junk food is trying to take over! Choose one of two characters (Mr. Broccoli or Super Asparagus) to save the city!

Title: Fortissimo FA INTL Ver
description: This is the whole package! Its got everything you're looking for. Combined perfectly with music, you'll be drawn in to the depth of 'Moe' and dragged right out to a hot-blooded battle. This is a galgame made with the tears and blood of the one and only La'cryma and proudly presented by SakuraGame.

Title: Clutter IX: Clutter IXtreme
description: Clutter IX: Clutter IXtreme is the most addicting un-Hidden Object game you will ever play. Explore over 1000 replayable levels, including the 100 Level Quest. The ultimate brain teaser!

Title: Game club "Waka-Waka"
description: Game Club "Waka Waka" [/] - computer club simulator!

Title: Paranoia: Deliver Me
description: Based on the best seller Paranoia, the story about Lingluo's college life will bring you to a world unknown. She pursues her music dream without knowing her life is about to be turned upside down. Losing her best friend and her confidence, she plunges into the depth of despair. What will she do?

Title: Terminate: Study X
description: Become the machine, find out what happened in New Sapiens and eradicate the infected in a single player first-person shooter campaign of horror and gore.

Title: Fable of the Sword
description: This is a galgame with a story of ancient. It takes the developing group 蔷薇千墨 6 years to finish. With full-audio, this game will present you an experience when swords did the talk for you. And with the amazing theme song, it will like returning to the ancient, simpler time.

Title: The Lotus Holidays
description: A stylish single player story-based game, where you win a free weekend at the "Lotus", a luxurious spa resort. But soon, things take a strange and sinister turn.

Title: Fluffy Store
description: A string of mysterious wind chimes brought three lovely and uninvited kemonomimi girls to this small convenience store. At such a summer night full of surprises and excitement, what lies ahead on their road of adventure?

Title: Jewel Match Solitaire Winterscapes
description: Grab a hot drink and cozy up to the fire. It’s cold outside and you’re snowed in with a game of Solitaire! Travel the icy land and rebuild 5 frosty locations across 200 levels, plus unlock 12 bonus game variants like Yukon and Emperor!

Title: Bad cat Sam
description: The cat, named serious Sam, is very upset when the house is in order and everything is in its place. Help Sam get inner peace.

Title: Game Of Mafia
description: Game Of Mafia is an adventure game set in New York City in the mid-1920s. You play as Frank, an ordinary postman whose quiet life changes dramatically when he meets his old friend. Opening your own bar sounds much better than delivering packages for the rest of life.

Title: Good Boy!
description: The game "Good boy" is an arcade game. Your character is the dog "good boy". The objective of the game is to get to the owner what she has lost. A good boy will face complex obstacles: garbage cans, fire hydrants, lasers, smart missiles and much more.
genre: Sexual Content, Action, Adventure, Indie, Racing, Simulation, Sports

Title: Vampires' Melody
description: 3 centuries have passed after sleeping for one night!? On a rainy night filled with thunderstorms, a young chef Raylan encountered a mysterious girl who resembled Sleeping Beauty in a huge tree hole, but everything suddenly went black before he could find out what happened...

Title: Anima: Gate of Memories
description: A third-person action RPG that brings to life the world of Gaia from the Anima: Beyond Fantasy RPG table-top books. Explore a deep and multifaceted story where your choices and actions directly impact the journey and decide the fate of the characters.

Title: Dehumanized
description: DeHumanized is a Roguelite sidescroller action shooter inspired by Metroid and Binding of Isaac.The world runs on physical rules with elements interacted subtly with each other. To survive you have to take strength from beasts, and learn rules how the world works.
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Early Access

Title: AfterWar
description: AfterWar is a new global strategy about the world in 2024

Title: Jewel Match Solitaire
description: Take a fantastical journey across the kingdom in this beautiful new Solitaire with 200 levels, multiple variants like Klondike, Freecell, and more! Build 5 majestic castles and search every last level for gems and coins to buy new upgrades and power-ups.

Title: Nadia Was Here
description: Nadia was Here is a gorgeous pixel RPG that is inspired by 8 and 16 bit classics. Featuring a groundbreaking combat system and a deep, charming story about the value of life, Nadia was Here lets you play an oldschool RPG in a brand new way!

Title: Jewel Match Solitaire Collector's Edition
description: Due to popular demand we created this enhanced version of Jewel Match Solitaire, the COLLECTOR'S EDITION. Featuring 320 (!) completely NEW levels (different from the regular version) and 18 bonus Solitaire variants, such as Klondike, Spider and Freecell, it's the ultimate relaxing Solitaire game!

Title: Godzilla Voxel Wars
description: Get ready to battle using your brain! A full-fledged turn-based strategy game with a difficulty level: GODZILLA! Godzilla, Mothra, King Ghidorah, and more are here to rampage across an 8x8 grid! Control Toho monsters and save the world from the Fungoid mushroom invasion!

Title: Tricolour Lovestory
description: Time flies and never comes back. But with an incredible 1-million-word script and 100+ original CGs, this game will take you back to when you were young, simple and pure. Go and get the love of your life back, start something new, or end everything in flame, that's for you to decide!

Title: My Little Sister Fiona
description: My Little Sister Fiona is a short kinetic novel about a brother taking care of his reclusive little sister. How far will you go to make sure she feels safe and protected?

Title: Mirror
description: This is a game that combines match-3, GALGAME elements and beauties. If you want to learn more about those beauties, you need to best them first. How the story goes is choice-based so your choices will ultimately decide their fate.

Title: Hunkenstein
description: The most fearsome monsters of classic cinema are now common household pests. You're the new exterminator in town. Unlicensed, of course. Shoot, crush, burn, or mulch these physics-based ghouls, then collect the check.

Title: Eve of Souls: Static Pod
description: [The pod will break soon. Will she survive the nightmare or find the truth?]

Title: Darksword: Battle Eternity
description: Darksword is an exciting, original non-stop VR action RPG. Venture deep into the world of the Twisted Corridors and defeat your enemies in style. Develop your own style of combat, exploit enemy weakness, and collect materials to get more powerful weapons!

Title: Vampires' Melody 2
description: Emerald seas! Blue skies! Sandy beaches! An island adventure in the ocean sounds like a trip to paradise. However, the place is a nightmare with no one to provide any blood for Raylan to feed on after he turned into a vampire by accident, especially since he has another hungry vampire at his side.

Title: Quest Rooms
description: You wake up in an obscure room, a voice on the TV says that it is just a quest where you have to find the way out. Brute force is not enough to survive to get out of the room you will have to be patient, use your brain and have grit.

Title: Yet another tower defence
description: Ancient demons summoned from the deep dark abyss, and brought ruin to Tiede, land of our home. You should know your towers, and use them wisely. Bring your sword, worrior, and your brave heart! Join me in this defence of the ancient...lands!

Title: Clutter Evolution: Beyond Xtreme
description: Clutter Evolution: Beyond Xtreme is the biggest Clutter game yet! You've never seen Clutter this fast and challenging. Solve over 1,700 puzzles and replay your favorites to your heart's content with randomly generated levels and endless possibilities.

Title: KumaKuma Manga Editor

description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?
