description: Control Craft 3 is a fast paced RTS which brings together quick thinking and clever tactics for some veritable planet conquering action!
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy

Title: Mini Island: Summer
description: Mini Island: Summer is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty!

Title: Gods Of Defense
description: Tower Defense Rogue-like. Defend a temple on a procedural map with variety of towers. Craft your strategy through Boon and Curse cards. With every run earn faith to upgrade the weapons. Many progression paths keep you engaged and entertained without getting stuck.

Title: Sir Questionnaire
description: A peaceful game of choice and chance as you explore the dark dungeon floors. Gameplay is based on choice: do you fight the creature, or try to run away? Do you take the potion? Spin the wheel? Drink the milk? Smash the crate? Hack the lobsters? Left door or right door? Make your choice!

Title: Monster MIX
description: Welcome to the world of funny monsters! Evolution simulator in 2D with cute graphics.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Sports, Strategy

Title: Chaos on Wheels
description: Take the wheel of a heavily armored car of your choice, and drive yourself to victory while shooting and destroying enemy cars, turrets, and hazards in this casual destruction car combat experience. Choose a driver, customize your cars, upgrade armor, buy new weapons, and leave nothing but chaos!

Title: Clear The Train
description: While cleaning the train, you can use a gun or a shotgun, if you don't want to use bullets, you can use your katana. Kill the zombies that damage you by exploding both from a close and a distance and try to pass the wagon as much as possible.

Title: Cinderella VR
description: Enter a world full of magic, fairy godmothers and storybook castles in Cinderella VR! Solve puzzles and play games with Cinderella as you cook, dance, design a gown, and pilot a magic pumpkin. All these and more charming minigames are included this wholesome, family-friendly adventure!

Title: Realm of Dread
description: Take a step into the Realm of Dread's world of horror and suspense. Explore mysterious locations, fight for survival within the realm of supernatural entities and uncover the secrets hidden in the shadows. This journey through darkness requires courage and intellect. Are you ready?

Title: Wanderer of Teandria
description: Wanderer of Teandria is challenging 2D platform game inspired by classic representatives of the genre. Find crystals and fragments of the map, avoid enemies and traps, and defeat giant bosses to succeed on the way to your destiny!

Title: Pathfinder: Gallowspire Survivors
description: A new roguelite survivor game set in the beloved fantasy world of Pathfinder. Enter Gallowspire, Pathfinder’s legendary tower of darkness, alongside your fearless companion. Slay hordes of enemies, upgrade your arsenal, and overcome deadly bosses to seal away the ancient king of undeath!
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, RPG, Early Access

Title: Zetria
description: An adult-only 2D pixel-art platformer!

Title: W. T. B.
description: This is a branded anniversary clicker!

Title: Devils & Demons
description: In a magic age, where dragons ruled and the world of Desola was at the height of its glory, a demonic portal opened its infernal abyss in the shadowlands. The realm was ravaged by Devils & Demons.

Title: BasCatball Mars: Basketball & Cat
description: Play basketball. In Mars. With cats. Are you ready for the whole galaxy's hardest matches? Solve puzzles and win the Bascatball intergalactic championship!

Title: Night Call
description: Friend. Confidant. Therapist. Voyeur. As a cab driver working the Paris night shift, you are many things to different people. Your gift is getting people to talk; and in order to catch the serial killer who left you for dead, that’s exactly what you’ll need to do.

Title: TAL: Wizard's Adventures
description: TAL: Wizard's Adventures – adventure about young wizard’s apprentice. With your help, Phineas has to go through burdens and trials for achievement one main goal. Our hero wants to gain true wizard attribute - the magic hat.

Title: Miss Kawaii 3
description: Surrounded by many beautiful girls, a mind-blowing, sexy journey has started. Relax, clear your mind and enjoy.

Title: Crimson Trigger
description: Welcome to Crimson Trigger, recruit! Embark on an important mission through the fantasy world of diverse landscapes in platforming style . Become stronger as you battle against the tyranny of the Marshal and his followers. Are you brave enough to bring down his White Crow Empire and avenge your loved one?

Title: Aggression: Europe Under Fire
description: Aggression is a military real-time strategy game set within a historic context featuring role-playing elements. Play the role of a political leader of Russia, Great Britain, France or Germany. It is up to you to take firm decisions at the crucial period of the European history – the World Wars ages covering 1914 – 1945.

Title: The Answer Is 42
description: The answer to life, the universe, and everything. Connect the numbers. Fill the board. You will find out.

Title: Molten Armor
description: Molten Armor is an action tower defense game with a non-linear story in sci-fi setting! Command defenses and stop hordes of enemies! Fight on land, sea and in the skies!Decisions taken in the heat of battle will change the course of the war.

Title: Halloween Trouble 3: Match 3 Puzzle
description: Help Jane restore her ancestral home in Halloween Trouble 3, a fun Match-3 game. The game includes minigames such as Jigsaws, Memory, Chain Solitaire and Sliders.

Title: Lake
description: It's 1986 - Meredith Weiss takes a break from her career in the big city to deliver mail in her hometown. How will she experience two weeks in beautiful Providence Oaks, with its iconic lake and quirky community? And what will she do next? It's up to you.

Title: Goblin and Coins II
description: Years have passed, decades maybe. Little goblin moved on, all but forgot about the great coin trouble, not even realizing that a new trouble is awaiting behind the doors!

Title: BattleTrucks
description: Battle Trucks it is a race on huge and furious trucks. Your aim is to destroy anyone who stands on your way to victory.
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, Racing, Simulation, Sports

Title: Kingdom Eighties
description: Kingdom Eighties is a short story-based standalone expansion set in the Kingdom universe. An epic singleplayer adventure of micro-strategy and base building. Defend your town against the mysterious Greed, and discover the secrets of your family lineage!

Title: The Fabulous Fear Machine
description: The Fabulous Fear Machine is a narrative-driven strategy game with a pulp horror style. As the Machine's new Master, you must sow fear and expand your influence by creating Legends, harvesting resources, manipulating events, and spying on your enemies.

Title: Sea of Stars
description: Sea of Stars is a turn-based RPG inspired by the classics. It tells the story of two Children of the Solstice who will combine the powers of the sun and moon to perform Eclipse Magic, the only force capable of fending off the monstrous creations of the evil alchemist known as The Fleshmancer.

Title: Tomb Raider: Underworld
description: Tomb Raider: Underworld represents a new advancement in exploration-based gameplay. As fearless adventurer Lara Croft explore exotic locations around the world, each designed with an incredible attention to detail resulting in breathtaking high-definition visual fidelity that creates a truly believable world and delivers a new level of...

Title: Blocks Tracks Trains
description: A relaxing sandbox train set diorama. Build a voxel world, create voxel buildings, set up your track network, and watch your trains go.

Title: The Music Machine
description: A teenage girl and the vengeful ghost possessing her stumble onto horrors of cosmic proportions as the latter searches for a way to murder the former.

Title: No Lights
description: Survive in countless levels and search for the lights.

Title: Space Squadron
description: Earth's last hope is in your hands, take control of the lone spaceship and protect Earth from alien swarms. Your goal will be quite challenging as you will have to save the Universe from its evil enemies.

Title: Alien Rage - Unlimited
description: Unleash a fury of powerful weapons as you blast your way through armies of Alien forces hell-bent on taking you down! Battle through 14 intense levels and prepare to face a barrage of beastly-sized bosses that will test your every skill. Each of your 10 weapons comes with two firing modes and you’ll need all of them!

Title: Mad Restaurant People
description: Progress your career as a server by using your keen perception, your short-term memory and your ability to decide quickly. Fancy and unique places will hire you as you master challenges, unlock perks and stay calm even in the weirdest situations. A time management memory game full of fun and chaos.

Title: Bullet Time
description: Bullet Time is the new shooting fun game. Mafia took your dog and you are coming for a big revenge! Use only one bullet and one shot to kill them all. Are you ready to test your shooting skills with one shot ONLY?

Title: Only Down!
description: Have game developers often forced you to climb somewhere with no purpose? This time, your goal is to hit rock bottom and nothing else. It should be simple enough, good luck to everyone.

Title: Extra Lives
description: See how long you can survive in a world full of brainless zombies and heartless humans! Find your place among hundreds of other characters spread across several warring factions, and battle to reclaim every corner of a sprawling city in real-time.

Title: FREM Sprite32!
description: Play, learn, and experiment with programming in the Sprite32! 8-bit microcomputer sandbox. Use the high-level FREMScript programming language to write programs, create dynamic pixel art, and explore audio generation. Play tutorials and challenges to learn all the aspects of the system.

Title: Settlement Survival
description: In this city-building game, you will lead a group of survivors in their search for a new home. Manipulate the landscape, manage limited supplies, plant crops, hunt wildlife, gather resources, and develop trade routes to build a bustling and unique town.

Title: Cosmic Armada
description: A fleet combat and space exploration game. Pilot ships, control a fleet, build and upgrade colonies, mine resources, craft items, trade, upgrade your ships and fleet, carry out missions, board ships, destroy ships and get revenge on the empire that conquered your home planet.

Title: Argonauts Agency: Pandora's Box
description: Argonaut Agency – chaos has emerged from Pandora's Box! Only you can stop the apocalypse!

Title: Kawaii Hentai Girls 2
description: It's a relaxing anime puzzle with cute kawaii girls. Solve puzzles, and enjoy high-quality artwork.

Title: Cards We're Dealt
description: Wander haunted halls as an office temp and collect magical cards with supernatural abilities to fight demons and and explore the underworld in this horror, deckbuilding, roguelike game.
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Free to Play

Title: NeoPiano
description: NeoPiano is a midi vizualizer software which brings live performances to life.
genre: Indie, Audio Production, Education, Video Production, Early Access

Title: Goliath Depot
description: Goliath Depot is a door-slamming 2D arcade platformer taken straight from the early 80's. Close all doors, kick the enemies and rack up a high score in 4 different worlds. Are you good enough to lift the curse of the Goliath Depot?

Title: Angry Cat
description: Angry Cat will immerse you in a fun and rewarding adventure. Show all your skill and coordination in this action-packed game. Can you lead the kittens to victory? 😻

Title: Meet Your Maker
description: Meet Your Maker is a building game of brutal expression and conquest. Unleash your inner evil genius in co-op or single-player to build the ultimate fortress of devious deathtraps, or take on those built by others in a high-stakes heist to steal resources essential for your survival.

Title: Monstrum
description: Monstrum takes the traditional survival horror formula and remixes it completely with procedurally generated levels, permadeath, and AI driven predators, ensuring that nowhere on its derelict cargo ship is ever truly safe.

Title: Kill The Topulus
description: Kill The Topulus is a simple first person shooter, shoot accurately to survive the attacks of giant rats and become a master of the Topulus by completing all the challenges in each level.

Title: The Divine Speaker: A Bounty Hunter's First Christmas
description: A Chistmas themed afterstory to The Divine Speaker featuring Leos and Raen! Search for the elusive Mister Bells, spend the Winter Solstice together, and win at rock-paper-scissors against your favorite ex-assassin turned bounty hunter!

Title: Hard Time
description: The toughest prison sim in the yard has been locked back up to serve another sentence in 2D!

Title: Sundered®: Eldritch Edition
description: Sundered is a chaotic hand­-drawn metroidvania where you resist or embrace ancient eldritch powers, a challenging and unique take on a classic genre from the creators of Jotun, now with local co-op!

Title: Dark Grim Mariupolis
description: Introducing “Dark Grim Mariupolis”, a classic adventure game set in a world, combining noir, Greek mythology, magic, mysticism, hopeless entourage of Greco-Roman Age of Decadence and stifling everyday routine. Encourage yourself and step into darkness…

Title: Black Book
description: “Black Book” is a dark RPG Adventure, based on Slavic myths, in which you play as a young sorceress. Fight evil forces in card-based battles and explore the world, where humans live alongside mythological creatures.

Title: Ragdoll: Fall and Destroy
description: Perhaps the craziest simulator of falls and destruction that you have seen! A variety of attractions, "beaters" and physics settings on the levels will definitely not let you get bored.

Title: Dinosaur Hunt First Blood
description: Dinosaur Hunt First Blood is a sequel to a first Dinosaur Hunt game and is a chaotic first person shooter that confronts heavily armed players with the most horrifying dino-humans.

Title: Suzy Burger
description: Welcome to Suzy Burger. Wear gloves and get ready to serve customers.

Title: Romguns
description: ROMGUNS is a dynamic and hardcore platformer, action shooter with a side view.

Title: Zombies In The Dark
description: Alan Rogers, who survived the zombie apocalypse since childhood, thanks to the invention of serum against the virus, follows a new order, allowing to seize any real estate if it is cleared of undead and goes to one of the three-storey mansions by the ocean to take possession of it.

Title: Battle Royale Craft
description: Do you like shooting games? Enjoy playing Battle Royale Craft with cool pixel art and fast action gameplay!

Title: Vacation Paradise: Florida Collector's Edition
description: Take a Vacation in Florida! Beautiful beaches, large lakes and exciting activities await.

Title: Blood Omen 2: Legacy of Kain
description: Cast down from power by a mysterious warlord centuries ago, Kain reawakens in a world he barely recognises. His armies slain, his vampire brethren nearly extinct, Kain is one of the last of his kind. With an agenda of vengeance, Kain shall unleash a wicked wrath to uncover the plot that threatens the land he seeks to conquer.

Title: Cooking Companions
description: Unravel the mystery in this cute psychological horror VN, set deep in the woods of the Tatras Mountains. Will you wind up on the chopping block?

Title: Rainswept
description: Rainswept takes you on an emotional adventure in a small town shaken by a double shooting. Join Detective Stone and unravel a tangled web of love, relationships, and unresolved trauma in this character-driven murder mystery game.

Title: Love Hentai: Fap Fast, Die Young
description: Fap Fast, Die Young

Title: Dungless
description: Dungless is a 2D platformer with a procedurally generated world that will create a unique adventure for you every time that never happens again. Fight monsters, collect gold, go deeper and deeper into the dungeons.

Title: Sir Whoopass™: Immortal Death
description: WARNING: This game contains puns, dad jokes, flappy-bird-like-arcade-minigames, breaking of the 4th wall and jabs directed at tryhard-overly-serious-RPGS. Do not play if you hate FUN or would not like to strap in for a Hilarious quest for The Legendary Villain-Beating Artifact™.

Title: Deus Ex: Human Revolution - Director's Cut
description: You play Adam Jensen, an ex-SWAT specialist who's been handpicked to oversee the defensive needs of one of America's most experimental biotechnology firms. Your job is to safeguard company secrets, but when a black ops team breaks in and kills the very scientists you were hired to protect, everything you thought you knew about your job...

Title: The madness of death
description: The madness of death is a first person psychological horror game. Explore the house in order to escape from it and break the curse of the Death Stone. You will have to solve the puzzles in order to advance and try not to stay in the dark.

Title: Atari Mania
description: A wild journey through videogame history, Atari Mania is a microgame collection wrapped in a hilarious retro-driven narrative of exploration and surprise.

Title: Escape Prison
description: Make a plan to escape from the prison and watch out from the guards in this funny casual game. Draw the escape route and help the prisoners to escape. So what’s your plan?

Title: The Wreck
description: In this 3D visual novel, follow failed screenwriter Junon as she attempts to make it through the most pivotal day in her life. Relive the past, alter the present, and embrace the future, or without your help, Junon’s story might end in a wreck.

Title: Towers of Thana
description: Towers of Thana is an action & strategy game where you invoke magic and summon towers to defend mythologies against a dark corruption. Travel to their homelands and rally legendary gods and creatures to your cause against Ogur, a God turned evil, and his corruption.

Title: Panzer Tactics HD
description: Strategists to the frontline!The HD remake of the Nintendo DS classic.Are you the strategist that the world has been waiting for?

Title: I commissioned some bees 5
description: I paid 10 more artists to hide bees in their artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

Title: Stunt Kite Masters VR
description: Carve up the sky in the most realistic virtual reality kite experience ever!

Title: Roguematch : The Extraplanar Invasion
description: Roguematch is a Fantasy Turn based Rogue-like fused into a Match-3 layout, giving players many more ways to get out of challenging situations! With so much raw elemental magic at your command, theres even more to do than just smack and bash your way through creatures from the extraplanar realms!

Title: From Earth To Heaven
description: In this game, you follow the protagonist who initially fell from heaven back into the sky. Many obstacles, cliffs, and small environmental puzzles are waiting. Are you ready for a beautiful surreal adventure?

Title: Zombie Drift
description: Will you beat all levels and become the drift killer? Zombies are everywhere! Unfortunately, you don’t have any weapon. But you do have a car! Now show those zombies who is the boss and show your drifting skills!!!

Title: Jigsaw Pieces - Sweet Times
description: Making jigsaw puzzles is incredibly popular for young and old. Let yourself be carried away by this ultimate form of relaxation and enjoy the heart-warming pictures and cute photographs. In this puzzle collection in HD quality, puzzle enthusiasts of all ages will be surrounded with pure cosiness!

Title: Candy Mandy
description: Classic game in the popular "three in a row" genre.

Title: Space Grunts 2
description: Space Grunts 2 combines some of the fastest turn-based gameplay with card-battling mechanics in a 1950's sci-fi roguelike setting.

Title: Dextram
description: This arcade shoot 'em up has no shooting and you can only turn right. Avoid waves of enemies and get points as they crash into each other. Pick up power-ups, such as a large laser or a force field to destroy the enemies. Die, get a score and repeat to get a higher score the next run.

Title: One Hour Left
description: Espionage is hard work. You will have to get to the enemy base and pretend to be your own among strangers. Can you cope with your task and can you prevent a war? But remember that you only have one hour left. But remember that you only have one hour left.

Title: King of the Hat
description: A 2D party platformer where you fight with a hat! Throw your hat to attack, defend and bait opponents. But watch out! If someone jumps on your hat... you die!

Title: On a Roll
description: Experience the adrenaline of performing insane stunts, getting big airs, grinding and bombing hills with the only inline skating game available: On a Roll. It has everything sport sim fans love and includes a replay editor, skatepark builder, open world and lots more.
genre: Action, Indie, Simulation, Sports, Early Access

Title: Onironauta
description: What would you do if you were trapped in your own mind? Simple graphical adventure about a lucid dream.

Title: Marauder
description: Marauder, is a squad based and tactical 3D game with RPG elements. It was released in late 2009, in Russia. You may know these names as the former made Brigade 7,62 and the later also published Pathologic.

Title: Boat Simulator Apprentice
description: Welcome to the simulator-arcade experience. Boat Simulator Apprentice is a small boat training game that caters to both simulator fans and arcade game lovers. Learn how to drive a motorboat via structured lessons, participate in rescue missions, time trials, treasure hunts, and boat sprints.
genre: Action, Indie, Racing, Simulation, Early Access

Title: BoomTown! Deluxe
description: An explosive combination of mining sim and city builder. Your dream of building your own thriving town starts with few explosive charges and a yellow truck. As you mine the landscape and the money starts to roll in you'll be able to expand your empire, buying buildings, shops and facilities.

Title: City Siege: Faction Island
description: The ultimate 2D Physics War Game - War just got fun, build your army with tanks, guns, spies, flame tanks and helicopters. Then embark on battles of mass destruction and tactical rescues. Bring peace to faction island by destroying all your enemies!

Title: A Little Golf Journey
description: A Little Golf Journey is a relaxing adventure golf experience played on beautiful diorama courses across a variety of destinations. Unlock secrets, discover treasure and take on challenges. Your journey awaits.

Title: Stronghold Legends: Steam Edition
description: Catapult werewolves over castle walls, incinerate troops with dragon fire and command the Knights of the Round Table! This remaster of the mythical ‘castle sim’ features Steam multiplayer, Workshop support, new maps, achievements and DLC campaigns.

Title: Vogue, The Explorer
description: Join the adventures of Lara into a Vogue strange world. You will need to use 3d platforming skills in order to evade. You will encounter some weird creatures that will attack you.

Title: Caretaker
description: Caretaker is a first-person horror experience. You are hungry for truth and maybe this "caretaker" is hungry for something else. Enjoy a ride of psychotic wickedness, through a maze of “criminally insane” mind

Title: Fairies Love
description: This is a casual gentleman game with exquisite characters. Go on adventures and get to know six different girls with unique personalities. Faced with their challenges, what choices will you make to let them become your girlfriends successfully?

Title: Stronghold Crusader HD
description: The highly anticipated sequel to the best-selling Stronghold, Stronghold Crusader HD throws you into historic battles and castle sieges from the Crusades with fiendish AI opponents, new units, 4 historical campaigns and over 100 unique skirmish missions.

Title: Stronghold 2: Steam Edition
description: Tax, torture or treat your peasants! Rehabilitate criminals or sentence them to death? Decide as you enjoy jousting over a lavish banquet, all while under siege from the warmongering Lord Barclay.

Title: Colored Shapes
description: Use physics to solve puzzles. Control gravity to move the main character on a dangerous adventure.

Title: Smile For Me
description: A heartbroken clown, wayward souls, and juicy mechanical lips. As “The Big Event" draws near, help the troubled residents of the Habitat and de-mask the mysterious Doctor Habit... before it's too late.

Title: Vacancy Unlimited
description: The dead fill the streets you grew up on. It's time to leave home in search for your father. Uncover the magical secrets of your family's past that will shape the apocalypse as you know it.

Title: Rise of the Funkys
description: A side scrolling beat 'em up game where you control 4 characters with unique combat mechanics. Make your way through 6 stages of this crime-ridden world, where random events happen to spice up the combat experience.

Title: Cards Survivors
description: Cards Survivors is a unique mix of card games, action games and roguelikes. Craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, discover relics of immense power, and survive as long as you can!

Title: Intruder Alert
description: Intruder Alert is an action-stealth 2D adventure combined with multiple other genres packed into a single game. Stealthily avoid other shapes, defeat them when necessary, and complete various tasks along your journey.
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Early Access

Title: CATACOMBS: The Beginning
description: Catacombs: The Beginning - is an excellent 3D shooter where you have to survive in the catacombs overfull of various monsters.

Title: Stronghold HD (2012)
description: The original castle sim, Stronghold HD allows you to design, build and destroy historical castles. Engage in medieval warfare against the AI in one of two single player campaigns or online with up to 8 players.

Title: Flight 74
description: Do you have what it takes to survive and become the ultimate pilot? Run missions for the South American Cartel and prove your worthiness.

Title: Q.U.B.E. 2
description: Q.U.B.E. 2 is the sequel to the hit first-person puzzle game Q.U.B.E. You are Amelia Cross, a stranded archaeologist who has awoken among the ruins of an ancient alien landscape. With the distant help of another survivor you must solve the puzzles of this mysterious world and find a way back home.

Title: Epic Manager - Create Your Own Adventuring Agency!
description: Epic Manager is a unique crossover between Sports Management and classic JRPGs. Experience an addictive “one more turn” mix of tycoon strategy, roguelike elements, roster management, combat and character progression, all rooted in an epic yet light-hearted fantasy setting. Rated ‘E’ for EPIC!

Title: Giana Sisters 2D
description: Giana Sisters 2D is a HD remake of the beloved Nintendo DS game from 2009. It features full controller support, precise, intuitive controls and a smooth learning curve. All balanced for hours of fun and challenge.

Title: PLATI NALOG: Favorite Russian Game
description: Attention: after this game you can begin to worry about the ordinary Russian person. Perhaps you will even feel sorry for him.

Title: Mini Island: Spring
description: Mini Island: Spring is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty!

Title: Rogue Door Defense
description: Rogue Door Defense is a tower defense mazing game with rogue-lite elements. Choose a door, defeat the enemies behind it and claim your unique reward. Build and upgrade different towers. Design your own maze to defend your lives against the attacking waves of monsters and powerful bosses.

Title: Drum Roll
description: Have you ever wanted to roll an oil drum? Roll the drum as far as you want with Drum Roll!

Title: Infini
description: Lose yourself in Infinity… but never lose Hope. Try to escape a world of never-ending puzzles and oddities.

Title: The Journey - Episode 2: Words of Wisdom
description: The second step that you never knew you needed to take to get to wherever you're wanting to go... You won't regret this experience. You have nothing to lose, and everything to gain...

Title: Game Of Puzzles: Nature
description: A puzzle game in which you have to assemble a single image from individual pieces.

Title: Avoid The Rain 2
description: This is an agile parkour game. You can dodge quickly to avoid raindrops falling from the sky and go to the designated place.

Title: PetShop
description: "PetShop" is the app that exports VRM format avatars with pets & items. Dogs, cats, sharks, squirrels, elephants, dragons, and many other animals. You can also use animal ears, tails and hats. The exported avatars can be used in VRM compatible metaverse. Join the Metaverse with "PetShop"!

Title: I Can't Believe It's Not Gambling 2(K)
description: Hey sports gamers, we heard you like "NOT gambling" in your sports games so we went ahead and took most of the sports out, to give you what we KNOW you all want! More not gambling!!!This is a gambling simulation game (with basketball on the side).

Title: Arizona Sunshine® 2
description: It's time to say hello to your old pal, Fred. Arizona Sunshine® 2, the next-gen sequel to the fan-favorite VR apocalypse, packs even more gore-geous zombie action! And what's better than braving the end of the f*cking world alone? Surviving it with your new best friend--Buddy.

Title: Projekt: Passion - Season 1
description: A futuristic adult visual novel filled with sex, comedy, drama, violence, and more sex. Go on a fun-filled space adventure and develop relationships with a diverse cast of characters with their own personalities and motivations.

Title: Lucifer Within Us
description: Solve 3 increasingly intricate murders by examining the evidence -- find the motive, the means, and the opportunity. Use testimonies of the suspects as evidence by examining every detail for contradictions... and signs of sin. Purify the possessed. Purge the daemons.

Title: Kathy Rain: Director's Cut
description: The award-winning point-and-click adventure returns in the Director's Cut with an extended story, additional puzzles, and new areas to explore. Witness the rise of an iconic detective as you uncover a dark and sinister truth hiding behind the calm exterior of a small rural town.

Title: Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary
description: Entirely rebuilt from the ground up, Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary is the ultimate celebration of the decade-old original, bringing refined visuals, completely redesigned and revised gameplay sections, and a whole new chapter to the award-winning, brain-twisting first-person puzzler.

Title: Gems of Magic: Father's Day
description: Rescue the lost son in this Match 3 Adventure, a story of a father and son enjoying Father’s Day until things go wrong. Enjoy the hand-drawn scenes and great visuals. Make smart use of the power-ups. Remove all obstacles during the quest. Reunite father and son in over 100 levels full of challenges.

Title: We. The Refugees: Ticket to Europe
description: ‘We. The Refugees: Ticket to Europe’ is a socially engaged, text-based RPG about a journalist looking for his big break by uncovering the plights of refugees travelling from Africa to Europe. It is a story inspired by true events.

Title: Tonight, I Die in My Sleep
description: Navigate broken memories in a powerless fantasy fueled equally by nightmares and confessional poetry.

Title: Hidden Shapes Animals - VR
description: Tired after a hard day at work? Now, with the help of VR, you will delve deep into an environment exclusively prepared for you to have fun and rescue your tranquility, surprising yourself with each solved puzzle!

Title: 100 hidden dogs
description: Hidden object game in the alien setting. Black and white hand-drawn graphics in a cartoon style. A large location and cute dogs.

Title: Mindless Running
description: Mindless Running - it's a classic runner with story mode. Explore a randomly-generated world while listening to a unique soundtrack!

Title: I commissioned some letters
description: I paid more artists to hide letters and stamps in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

Title: Blagmoz
description: Dash, cast, and buff your way to the top of Blagmoz Tower in this lightning-fast PVP precision platformer. Power up by drinking potions, getting kills, and sacrificing your friends at the Altar. Become the ultimate glass cannon in this one-hit-kill battle of sorceries, online or on the couch!

Title: The Longest Road on Earth
description: A thoughtful and deeply personal title with stripped-down mechanics. The lack of dialogue or text allows you to create your own narrative through your time with four characters. Each short story will allow players to be swept away by the haunting lyrics of over twenty original, nostalgic songs.

Title: DiamondFalls
description: DiamondFalls is a captivating and challenging match-3 puzzle game for enthusiasts of the genre. Players must solve each puzzle by collecting all diamonds and balls of the same color in a specific order within a limited amount of time.

Title: Dealer Simulator
description: Dealer Simulator invites you to a world where your bargaining skills will be tested to the limits, and you'll never know what lies behind each door. Are you ready to become a top-tier trader? Join the warehouse adventure with Dealer Simulator!

Title: Russian Prison Sport: OCHKO
description: And what will you sacrifice in order to survive? OCHKO?

Title: Last Anime Boy 2: Hentai Zombie Hell
description: In 2088, Nazi Muslims achieved great success in the field of chemical weapons and, not to fall into captivity and fight even after death with the infidels, they created a serum that turned them into zombies.

Title: PenBall
description: There is a ball on a small field with a top view. Your gate is at the bottom, and your opponent's gate is at the top. Your goal is to score the ball into the opponent's goal.

Title: 1001 Jigsaw. Castles And Palaces 4
description: Majestic buildings and architecture from different eras. Assemble puzzles and enjoy great pictures.

Title: Deus Ex: The Fall
description: Deus Ex: The Fall is set in 2027– a golden era for science, technology and human augmentation, but also a time of great social divide and global conspiracy. Powerful corporations have seized control from governments and command the drug supply needed by augmented humans to survive.

Title: Stranded In Time
description: Stranded In Time takes you on a fun and exciting adventure to explore a mystery out of this world! Play as Olivia - a young woman from a big city - who joins her uncle Peter and writer Nick on an exploration of an abandoned church that hides a secret beyond any wild dream!

Title: Flow:The Sliding
description: Enjoy the rhythmic music and beat the SCORE!!!

Title: Stack Masters
description: Do you enjoy playing around with the physics in games? Then this is the game for you. Stack Masters is built around exploring that concept in a competitive way. Including a built in level editor and Steam Workshop support, the game offers a never ending supply of physics sandbox gameplay to explore.

Title: Her Heart's Desire: A Landlord Epic
description: Become a writer with a drinking problem and enjoy the debauchery when you rent out the spare bedrooms in your new house to three gorgeous women. Can you romance Daisy, Lily, and Rose? Find out in this farcical adult visual novel where you make the choices!

Title: Tinhead
description: Leap, slide, hop, fly and shoot your way through wacky worlds and super-tricky challenging levels as you guide Tinhead to free the stars. Take on pesky spinning Krystals, relentless flying Saw-Sirs and hordes of mega-tough bosses.

Title: Spot The Dot
description: A little game where you have to break objects at an ever increasing rate.

Title: My Girlfriend is a Musician
description: “My Girlfriend is a Musician” is a Music Tour Management Simulator and Yuri Dating Simulator. Play as an aspiring junior tour manager helming a series of concerts around Europe for an eccentric yet extremely entertaining Rockstar!

Title: Sea of Choices
description: With both RPG and Time Management mechanics, plot out your day to day life in the shoes of Aura! In combat use turn-based tactics to employ a strategy that leads to victory! Or just chill out and collect records and read books!

Title: Recursive Ruin
description: A story rich narrative puzzle game in which an artist comes to terms with their grief. Explore an infinitely recursive world of strange fractal beauty and solve mind-bending puzzles. Confront the ineffable and chat with your cat in a search for meaning and hope.

Title: Feed Him
description: Welcome to Feed Him, a horror-themed adventure game set in a small, innocent-looking town. Uncover dark secrets, explore eerie places, defeat your evil roommate and escape before it's too late. Immerse yourself in a spine-chilling experience with stunning graphics.

Title: The Last One
description: Once a prosperous city Istanbul is fallen. Prepare your gear, defeat zombie hordes and reclaim your hometown. Uncover hidden story behind the disaster and learn what controls the zombies. Select your side between military and rebels and fight for the control of the city.

Title: The USB Stick Found in the Grass
description: A forensic challenge – find out who the owner of the USB stick was and reconstruct their story.

Title: ICE AGENT
description: Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) are responsible for preventing illegal immigration and preventing the unlawful traffic of goods into the US. Have you ever thought what it would be like to be one of those agents? What choices they have to make on daily basis?

Title: Last Night Shift
description: Last Night Shift is a first-person horror game that creates a spooky atmosphere and tension. An ordinary night shift at a motel turns into a living nightmare.

Title: 1001 Jigsaw Castles And Palaces 2
description: 1001 Jigsaw Castles and Palaces 2 - Medieval atmosphere in all its splendor in 500 high-quality photos.

Title: Dark Fantasy 2: Jigsaw Puzzle
description: The next of the most atmospheric jigsaw puzzle game with lots of dark ladies to unify.

Title: Magi Trials
description: Do you have what it takes to join the Royal Academy of Magi in a new Highschool Romance story. After attempting a dark ritual which increases innate magical ability, but transforms your body.

Title: Quickflash - A Fabula Story
description: A strategy, turn-based fantasy game in the worlds of darkness and light.

Title: Flying Aces - Navy Pilot Simulator
description: Flying Aces - Navy Pilot Simulator is a story based virtual reality (Oculus & Vive) experience unlike any other. You will experience what it’s like to train to become a navy pilot.

Title: Yukar From The Abyss
description: A fantasy otome game based on the myths and legends of Hokkaido, Japan. Meet and fight with unique Gods, overcome fierce trials together, and discover what happens when you pursue forbidden love with the divine..

Title: Dofense
description: Defend the energy cores from ever increasing enemy waves by destroying their spawn gates. Build tower mazes on Hex grid. Adapt them to dynamic changes in the terrain. Face quirky bosses. Design your own levels and share them on the Steam Workshop.

Title: Lanternium
description: You have to find out what happened in this fantastic world and help the Raccoon find his way home!

Title: X Invader
description: 'X Invader' is a roguelite game where you play a hacker infiltrating corporation servers. Join the 'Rinascita' group to uncover hidden secrets. Use colleagues' add-ons to defeat security codes.

Title: Awakened Evil
description: Awakened Evil is an action platformer inspired by the classics. Jump and slash your way through intense linear stages that will put your skills to the test. Do you have what it takes to slay all the bosses, and take on evil itself?

Title: a pet shop after dark
description: PETSITTER WANTED. A horror point-and-click adventure game. Water the plants, feed the pets, and DON'T turn off the lights.

Title: The Life of a Magical Circle
description: The Life of a Magical Circle is a roguelite in which you dodge obstacles and pick up circles. It's a game about finding your purpose in life and focusing on it, and you'll have to figure it all out with only a little help from your mysterious narrator.

Title: Dismantled
description: Dismantled is a survival horror game inspired by the old Resident evil games, The Suffering games and by old B-movies... If you like survival-horror and puzzles you'll probably love it!

Title: Alice's Jigsaw. Wonderland Chronicles
description: Solve 120 unique patchwork mosaics and dive into a fairytale world full of magic and colorful characters!

Title: Geist
description: The Empire has enlisted you in the Geist Squad. Complete missions based on WWII in order to fulfill the Empire. Each one will be harder than the last in this WWII FPS. You the Player will have to fight through the enemies of the Empire. You will face heavily armed soldiers based on events in WWII.

Title: Dinosaur Hunt Puzzle
description: Dinosaur Hunt Puzzle is a sliding puzzle game based on the artwork from original Dinosaur Hunt game.

Title: Duralumin Wind
description: Duralumin Wind is a twin stick shooter. Play across four missions completing objectives and collecting supplies.

Title: Star Ship Survivor
description: Player move ship and dock with blocks. This docking will be on contacted position, so your ship can be ugly shap. But if your control was good at moving ship, your ship will be cool. Try this trip and survive. And if you can, try making cool shape ship.

Title: 6N23
description: 6n23 is a action-platfomer-racing game. Rush fast as you can. Use your finger, find path. It has controls similar to a fighting game, allowing you to practice your control skills.

Title: Farm Frenzy Collection
description: Enjoy the farmhouse gems with this solid set of 12 Farm Frenzy titles! Join Scarlett throughout all of her adventures in hundreds of farming challenges. Raise chickens, ostriches, and dolphins. Bake cakes, grow crops, and sell items at markets. It's an all-out farming assault with one of the most enjoyed series ever!

Title: Bard Harder!
description: BARD HARDER! is a tabletop-inspired visual novel game about saving your friends from the Big Bad Evil Guy by using your strongest weapon: romance! So brush up on your pick-up lines and prepare some sexy tunes…what’s the worst that could happen?

Title: GuluGuluLand3D
description: A classic action-style, 3D game from the NES era! Unity-chan keeps running and can't stop. Use the actions of grabbing the stick with one hand to turn, and grabbing the stick with both hands to jump, and lead her to clear the stage.

Title: Aerial Destruction
description: Take off your helicopter and unleash destruction on the armed groups of bio-engineered mutants through various missions and environments !

Title: Command: Modern Operations
description: Command: Modern Operations is the next generation in cross-domain modern wargaming. It enables you to simulate every military engagement from post World War II to the present day and beyond. The scale is primarily tactical/operational, although strategic scale operations are also possible.

Title: Lilly's Flower Shop
description: Enjoy this great Match 3 Flower Shop Adventure. Form groups of three or more flowers, gardening stuff and other flower shop items to unlock powerful boosters and help Lilly to realize her dream. Use the right strategy, earn coins and build the most beautiful flower estate in town.

Title: Isles of Cubes
description: Strategy Puzzle Game. Explore and colonize islands. Establish production chains. But your resources and space are limited. You must plan carefully.

Title: Stapel
description: The Stapel is a game of your reaction speed. You stack rectangular figures one on top of the other by timely fixation at the moment the figure passes over the previous one.

Title: Zup! 4
description: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

Title: BlackChain
description: A classic single-player RTS set in a Solar System ruled by megacorporations. Journey from Mars all the way to Planet 9 and uncover the secrets of the BlackChain.

Title: RUSH!!!
description: RUSH!!! is an action-packed, nostalgic pixel precision platformer. Manipulate your environment and gravity to flip your world upside-down, and conquer levels by capturing the flag. Ready to test your precision pixel skills?

Title: Murder Diaries 3 - Santa's Trail of Blood
description: In this game you abstractly follow the narration of a joung man who slowly but surely becomes insane. This leads you straight into the middle of an exciting murder case and a murder mystery unfolds while you listen to the testimonies of witness, friends and relatives.

Title: Overpass
description: A rhythm adventure from a new perspective. Drive and drift to the beat on a futuristic road trip through the music, where the skyline is always in sync.

Title: Flappy Shooter
description: Try the fun combination of Flappy Bird and Rogue Shooter! Random locations, guns and Bosses, simple controls and colorful graphics. What else do you need for fun?

Title: Burn Me Alive
description: Explore a surreal world, solve puzzles, fight monsters and get to the bottom of the mystery of this compelling horror thriller.

Title: SONIC SUPERSTARS
description: Adventure through the mystical Northstar Islands in this all-new take on classic 2D Sonic high-speed action platforming.

Title: The Ranch of Rivershine
description: Saddle up and build your own horse ranch! Raise foals, care for your horses and train them as you explore the western wilderness! Participate in cross country competitions and become your town's champion. Befriend the villagers who'll help you on your adventure at the Ranch of Rivershine!

Title: Depths of Sanity
description: A mysterious signal. A missing crew. And the one man trying to piece it all together. As Abe Douglas, dive deep into a fully underwater metroidvania to explore massive oceanic biomes, battle monstrous bosses, and piece together a mystery that threatens not only your crew, but your own sanity.

Title: The Complex
description: After a major bio-weapon attack on London, two scientists find themselves in a locked-down laboratory with time, and air, running out. The Complex is an interactive sci-fi thriller movie where your decisions lead to one of eight suspenseful endings.

Title: On My Own
description: Craft your own tools and manage your resources in this tranquil survival adventure. Charming naturescapes and original music frame your quest to conquer the mountain as you endeavor to make the most of your “one wild and precious" life.

Title: RoundRunners Playground
description: Play tag-like gamemodes with a chance of random effects to happen. Roll, climb and bunnyhop to dodge fellow roundrunners as you’re trying not to get tagged. Face up against your friends or randoms in this easy-to-pick-up game. Make the map your playground.

Title: Tomb Raider: Legend
description: Follow Lara Croft down a path of discovery as she travels the globe to remote, exotic locales in search of one of history's greatest artifacts, that unleashes unwelcome figures from Lara's mysterious past.

Title: Hidden Cats in London
description: Meow meow! Kittens are hidden in London, let's find them all. A short and pleasant experience! Start with a Beautiful monochromatic illustration, relax and find all the cats one by one to reveal the final colored art. Play through different modes, find special cats, and unlock bonus levels!

Title: Memorize Cards
description: This is a little game in the genre of paired images for memory.

Title: Infliction
description: Wander through an interactive nightmare set within the confines of a once-happy household. Piece together the mystery behind a harrowing series of events while struggling to survive encounters with an entity that relentlessly stands in the way of finding absolution.

Title: With Good Intentions
description: "With good intentions" is a nonlinear visual novel. Escape from a cursed monastery, win over its mighty Overlord, save your love and uncover the mysteries of time itself!

Title: SeaBed
description: SeaBed is a yuri-themed mystery visual novel told through the perspectives of three separate characters: Sachiko, Takako and Narasaki.

Title: Isolated Room
description: What to do when your days are not going well? What to do when you need to wake up and manage a troubled life, in which you need to work, eat well and still have time for yourself? Isolated Room is about that, and maybe a little more.

Title: QUICAL
description: It is a casual and easy to play Battle Royale FPS game.Battle Royale mode is single player only - no need to worry about inconveniencing your teammates or being verbally abused on voice chat!Enjoy small scale Battle Royale with up-to 8 players!

Title: Cat Attack
description: JRPG similar to Final Fantasy/Lufia with an overworld and a variety of dungeons. Many party members with unique skills/abilities. Not early access, but will be updated in the future based on user input and other information.

Title: Infinitrap : Rehamstered
description: Infinitrap: Rehamstered is a top-down pixelart action platformer where you, Ohio Jack, the world’s 2nd best treasure hunter, run, crouch, jump, slide and DIE! (horribly) in repeated attempts to reach the Cup of Eternity. But it's not all just senseless brutality!

Title: Blankspace
description: Blankspace is an escape room visual novel with point-and-click elements. Interact with Beryl, investigate your surroundings, solve puzzles, and find your way out of a strange-looking room!

Title: Firefight!
description: Put out the fires and rescue the hostages in this fast-paced arcade game!

Title: Guns and Rush
description: Immerse yourself in a post-apocalyptic wasteland in this intense horde combat shooter that combines roguelike and bullet-hell elements. Battle relentless waves of monstrous foes as you strive to survive and conquer challenging levels. In my game no vampire, survive 20 minutes!

Title: Incremental Factory
description: Craft and automate an industrial empire from scratch! Experience a strategic game teeming with challenges as you manage resources, overcome hurdles, and optimize production chains. Are you ready to conquer the challenges of Incremental Factory? Your journey starts here... The Factory Must Grow!
genre: Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Clowns
description: Clowns-2d shooter with platformer elements, where the player protects the circus tent from the incoming wave of mad clowns, picking up unique weapons and bonuses that will help in passing the levels and the final meeting with a huge clown. Feature of game: - Complexity - Pixel-Art - Unique weapon

Title: Hentai: Maid Madness
description: Embark on a captivating journey surrounded by regal charm in this alluring jigsaw adventure! Immerse yourself in the world of Maids, where you'll encounter a variety of stunning girls sure to captivate your imagination!

Title: Bloodroots
description: One-hit kill die-retry murderballet. Left for dead by a colorful band of bandits: you will chain killing sprees to exact revenge on the treacherous Mr. Black Wolf. Improvise your kills with utterly everything you can get your hands on: from carrots to plasma guns.

Title: OG Puzzlers: Kira Maus
description: OG Puzzlers: Kira Maus is an casual puzzel game with cute dog images. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

Title: The WILDS
description: Become iconic animals and fight for survival in the The WILDS. Finding food, water, and shelter will be the easy part, protecting your family from hungry predators and a harsh environment will separate the weak from the strong. Welcome to a uniquely immersive animal experience...

Title: MINDHACK
description: Change the minds of evildoers…for good! MINDHACK is a text adventure game where you meet unique evildoers, hack their minds, and rewrite them into happy people!

Title: Neon Idle
description: Buy the neons and earn money as much as you can! - Enjoy the enthusiasm of the neon design. - Enjoy the chain effect of skills, terrains, and upgrades. - Calculate which upgrade can effectively increase the normal earning of money!

Title: Sunrider 4: The Captain's Return
description: Captain Kayto Shields returns from exile in Sunrider 4: The Captain’s Return for a new space adventure!

Title: Blinky
description: You play as a small-eyed creature who needs to shoot bacteria falling on the island.

Title: The Coin Game
description: A collection of ticket redemption arcades with realistic physics, a carnival, goofy robots, open world design, a global ranking system and silly prizes. Featuring 40+ modern inspired arcade machines and a pawn shop to keep money in your pocket. The Coin Game is made by a solo developer.
genre: Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Early Access

Title: Meg's Monster
description: Take control of the Underworld’s grumpiest ghoul to help a lost little girl find her way home in this creepy-cute indie adventure. Just be warned: if she cries, the whole world dies.

Title: Puzzle Light: One Move
description: Only one move to turn on all the lights. Can you do this?

Title: Lucky gem
description: Work with various sprites to collect gems of different colors and shapes, and help the sprites repair their home.

Title: Only Me
description: After waking up Your brain hurts Outside the window is the vast space Memory seems a bit messy People around you tell you who you are and what your mission is But you know you can’t believe it all... "Only me" is a stand-alone game with a space background of decryption and stealth shooting.
Publisher: 崔资坦独立游戏工作室

Title: Shine's Adventures 0 (Zombies Reload)
description: Shine woke up in an unfamiliar place, and she found many horrible zombies around. In order to survive, Shine needs to explore this unfamiliar place. She needs to collect weapons, medicines, items and so on.Everything is to survive.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Strategy, Early Access

Title: MotoGP™19
description: Race with official 2019 Championship riders! Have fun with the new multiplayer experience and become Race Director. Challenge the new AI, take a ride through the history of the MotoGP™ and unleash your creativity with the graphic editors.

Title: Draft of Darkness
description: Draft of Darkness is a survival horror RPG with deck building and roguelike dungeon exploration. Recruit allies, synergize their decks to create powerful card combos. Manage your limited resources and explore procedurally generated maps to determine the story's outcome.

Title: BM Studio
description: BM Studio is a program for creating melodies. Select the sounds you like and the program will turn your keyboard into a musical instrument!
genre: Indie, Simulation, Audio Production, Education, Software Training, Utilities, Game Development, Early Access

Title: Kaya Joshi: Magical Detective
description: Kaya Joshi: Magical Detective is a family friendly Hidden Object Adventure. The game blends Hidden Object game play with Adventure gameplay.

Title: Puzzle Light
description: Swap the pieces to form the circuit and turn on the lights in this puzzle game.

Title: Estiman: Game of Estimation
description: ESTIMAN is a relaxing arcade game with original estimation-based gameplay

Title: Melody of Seasons
description: Farming RPG and Life Sim. Harvest crops, raise livestock, forage, fish, mine, craft, and cook. Get to know the locals. Collect items and uncover mysteries. Customize your appearance, upgrade your house and improve your farm. Get married. Have a kid. Make grandpa proud! Live the farmer life!

Title: iHUGU: I Hug You
description: One hug can change the world. Hug once every creature you meet. Don’t forget anyone.

Title: The Hayseed Knight
description: A ragtag band of misfits tell the unlikely tale of a one-eyed farmboy's accidental rise to fame in this fully voice-acted animated visual novel.

Title: Passpartout 2: The Lost Artist
description: Embark on your struggling artist adventure. Draw and sell art to cheeky critics to reclaim your lost art career. Explore the endearing art-starved town of Phénix and show them you're a true artist!

Title: Jigsaw Puzzles: Fantasy Landscapes
description: Enjoy 30 puzzles of increasing difficulty featuring original artwork of stunning fantasy landscapes!

Title: Lightmatter
description: A first-person puzzler where shadows kill you. Watch your step or be swallowed by the darkness.

Title: Aisling and the Tavern of Elves
description: “Aisling and the Tavern of Elves” is an Isekai Fantasy-Comedy Dating Sim Visual Novel, where you play as Aisling Whitehorse, a hapless mercenary turned tavern owner eking out a living in the Elven Kingdom of Eiredagh.

Title: 100 hidden mushrooms
description: Hidden object game in a fairytale setting. Black and white hand-drawn visual style. A very difficult game for any age!

Title: Astral Guardian
description: Build various towers to resist the large number of monsters coming from the wormhole, by extending their walking routes.

Title: BUSTAFELLOWS
description: A new visual novel from the legendary eXtend! Mixing dangerous romance with murder mystery, BUSTAFELLOWS is a steamy noir mystery that will make you shiver but ask for more!

Title: Lost in the Forest
description: Join the adventures of a little boy that is lost in the forest. You must avoid all the forest creatures, like the fox, the frog, the hedgehog and many others (even a shark). Travel through many locations and try to find your way back.

Title: Tomb Raider
description: Tomb Raider explores the intense origin story of Lara Croft and her ascent from a young woman to a hardened survivor.

Title: Negligee
description: A story of love and lingerie as you are thrust into the role as manager of the shop 'Negligee' alongside three beautiful women.

Title: Cafe Deux Femmes
description: “Café Deux Femmes” is a coming-of-age, slice-of-life Yuri Visual Novel and Dating Sim where you play as a recent college grad who is trying to find out where they belong in the world and what they should do with their life.

Title: Kids of Hellas: Back to Olympus
description: Propelled by envy at his brother, Hades instigates the sorceress Ate exiled from Olympus to cast a wicked spell. As a result, Zeus' children fall down from the heavens, and the Thunderer forgets about their existence. Will the kids survive on the earth without food and essentials?

Title: Amazing Human Simulator
description: Do you like destruction? Then let's enjoy destruction to the utmost!

Title: Cat or Bread?
description: A game about cat and bread.

Title: Roady Life
description: Experience the life of a trucker, delivering cargo between various industries. Feed the most valuable production lines or fulfill contracts to earn enough money to own the largest fleet of trucks among your friends, or start your own industries to maximize your profits.

Title: Bug Blazer
description: A casual Incremental idler/clicker mix with a variety of weapons and traps to achieve your goals. No prestige, and ever increasing progress; watch the numbers get ever larger to the point where the fabric of reality breaks down.

Title: Bit-Boom
description: The eight-bit first-person shooter in the NES palette!

Title: RC Simulation 2.0
description: Drive all kinds of RC Cars, Boats, Rock Crawlers, Planes or Quadcopters on any of the 250+ Workshop Tracks. The game includes an in-game Track Editor and Vehicle Painter to create tons of scenarios and Paint schemes. RC Sim is made by a solo developer and still is in development.

Title: Horror Tale 2: Samantha
description: A chilling continuation of the adventure of Tom and his friends

Title: Mummy on the run
description: A puzzle game in a beautiful 3D landscape. Solve the puzzle in each room and fight for the liberty of the mummies!
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy

Title: Intruder In Antiquonia
description: Intruder In Antiquonia is a narrative mystery adventure that will immerse you in the Internet-hostile town of Antiquonia. Sarah does not remember who she is and how she got there. Help her solve the mysteries of her past while exploring beautiful hand-drawn environments.

Title: CyberHive
description: CyberHive is a strategic space travel simulator with a non-linear story, in the cosmic opera setting, and in an anime visual style.

Title: Beach Invasion 1945 - Pacific
description: Beach Invasion 1945-Pacific is a World War II FPS game where players defend fortified Pacific island beaches from invading armies of troops, tanks, and planes. Use iconic Japanese and American WWII weapons and prepare your defenses with mines, explosives, and bonuses!

Title: Outbreak: Endless Nightmares
description: The nightmare continues for Lydia and her fellow survivors. Experience true horror in this co-op survival horror roguelike.

Title: Breakdown
description: This is a minimalistic arcade game where you control a bouncing ball. Your task is to punch the blocks down until there are no blocks left and the ball reaches the bottom.

Title: Cosmos Bit
description: Cosmos Bit is an old school metroidvania that will take you in an extraterrestrial world painted with the legendary Amstrad CPC's colour palette, reworked for modern devices. The game is enjoyable for both veterans and newbies of this genre!

Title: Wormhole: Battle for Planet Earth
description: Wormhole: Battle for Planet Earth - This is a fantastic third-person action game. In the game you are waiting for aliens, teleporters, dark matter and hurricane action.

Title: I commissioned some dogs 2
description: I paid more artists to hide dogs and bones in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

Title: C.B.T
description: C.B.T (Crazy Ball Time) is a ball-rolling platformer, with crazy tough action, and even crazier Balls.

Title: We. The Revolution
description: As a judge of the Revolutionary Tribunal, preside over complicated cases of ordinary citizens, dangerous criminals, and enemies of the revolution in revolutionary Paris. Make judgments, plot political intrigue, and try to not lose your own head!

Title: Castle Defender
description: Castle defender is a fast-paced defending arcade-strategy game where you must use spells to stop various enemies that will come and try to destroy your castle.

Title: Choice of Life: Middle Ages
description: A card game in a Medieval setting where you make decisions on which not only your life will depend, but also the future of the kingdom!

Title: Arcanum
description: A Co-op 1-4 player horror survival which will have you searching for clues, items, aiming to solve the mystery of Arcanum whilst running for your life... Discover what happened to the previous residents and escape whilst you can..

Title: kHED
description: kHED is a 3d low-poly model editor for indie game developers and modding enthusiasts

Title: Royal Jigsaw
description: Royal Jigsaw is a jigsaw puzzle game. In this game a player assembles a picture of certain number of puzzle elements.

Title: Tails Noir Preludes
description: Tails Noir Preludes is a post-noir narrative adventure with branching choices. It is an intertwined series of vignettes about change, circumstance, and consequence. Guide four characters through formative moments in their lives in a dystopian Vancouver inhabited by anthropomorphic animals.

Title: Jetpack Dog
description: What does the dog do when no one is home? He puts on a jetpack and, dodging lasers, collects bones!

Title: Thief
description: Garrett, the Master Thief, steps out of the shadows into the City. In this treacherous place, where the Baron’s Watch spreads a rising tide of fear and oppression, his skills are the only things he can trust. Even the most cautious citizens and their best-guarded possessions are not safe from his reach.

Title: Struggling
description: Struggling is a physics-based co-op platformer with a twisted spin on teamwork. Control the arms of a squishy abomination and lead it through a deranged world.

Title: Monster College
description: The protagonist of this story discovers that he is a werewolf. In his new life, he will meet beautiful women, each with their own fascinating peculiarities: demons, vampires, zombies, werewolves, gorgons...

Title: Thief™ Gold
description: Stalk your prey on the quest for stolen goods with your blackjack, sword, and an assortment of unique arrows. Steal for money and uncover the hidden agendas of your allies and enemies as you play through an unravelling story of deception and revenge.

Title: Maze Shooter
description: Maze Shooter is a smart challenge, a maze adventure VR game that can be freely combined through maze gameplay. Before playing, SteamVR needs to be set to OpenXR.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy

Title: The Protagonist: EX-1
description: You’re a highly trained soldier on a mission to infiltrate an alien space station that goes horribly wrong—find your team and discover the hidden truth. Upgrade, Craft, and Discover technologies, Enhance your character’s skills in this gripping turn-based tactical RPG.

Title: Blipz
description: Blipz is a unique and addictive arcade puzzler that serves as a tribute to the main design mechanic of Tetris, creating order from chaos.

Title: Backfirewall_
description: Hello and welcome to Backfirewall_, a first-person tragicomic adventure set inside a smartphone. You are the update assistant. Solve wacky puzzles to counter the update and save the previous operating system from deletion. The fate of the System is in your hands!

Title: Frog Detective 1: The Haunted Island
description: You're a detective, and a frog, and it's time to solve a mystery.

Title: The Rumble Fish 2
description: A legendary arcade game developed by Dimps in 2005. This fighting game gained popularity for its smooth visuals powered by S.M.A as well as the high level of strategy driven by its 2-gauge system. And with the addition of new current-gen features it's even easier to play.

Title: Before Nightfall: Summertime
description: In this game you will walk through a beautiful summer forest in search for firewood

Title: Rabbit Canyon
description: You play the role of a brave hare running through a dangerous gorge.

Title: Fortune's Run
description: Explore a decaying industrial world left behind in humanity's never-ending race to conquer the stars. Beneath its iron skies, desperate souls kill and steal for passage to the still-plentiful frontier worlds. Sink or swim in this high-octane first-person shooter with immersive sim elements.

Title: Call of the Wild: The Angler™
description: From the creators of theHunter: Call of the Wild comes an open world fishing experience! Relax and unwind at your favorite spot or explore the beautiful great outdoors with friends as you embark on the journey to become a master angler.

Title: Hi-Fi RUSH

I.R.I.S.’s only ally is her engineer Pablo, who gets conscripted into the quest after his pant leg gets caught in her chassis. Hunted by the psychopathic motorcycle S.P.I.K.E. and a multinational weapons cartel, I.R.I.

description: Snowball Christmas festival is a puzzle game, the ultimate goal of which is to swap the blocks to collect the image. But remember, the purpose of this game is to let you relax and enjoy the process. To do this, we added a minimalistic interface and relaxing music.
